description: Relive the film (TRON 1982) as you try and cut off your opponents before they cut you off! Now with user options 1. Bike Colour select from 6 colours 2. Toggle Music / SFX on/off 3. Select Game Speed (Slow, Normal, Fast, Extreme) Android port of the open source glTRON a 3D lightbike racing game.

Never miss the best sights on your trip again. Tripomatic allows you to pick attractions that you want to see and create a day-by-day itinerary for your journey. It is the best way to explore the places you have never visited before . FEATURES • Choose the best places to visit from our curated list of more than 100.000 attractions , covering 150+ countries - never miss out on the best sightseeing again • Plan your travel itinerary in just a few minutes - spend your time on travel, not on planning • Get weather forecast - what is the best day to schedule that river cruise for? • Use time & distance estimates - is the way from the station to your hotel worth taking a taxi? • Sync the itinerary across all your devices - you’ll always have your dream trip close at hand • Find a hotel in your destination and save it to your itinerary - always find a way back to your hotel • Enjoy detailed and walking-friendly maps - explore the city in the best way possible, on foot • See subway lines on the map in popular cities - quickly get around town like a local • Download offline maps and use the app offline (available as in-app purchase) - no more roaming fees • Download and print out a PDF guide - don’t worry about battery power. REVIEWERS SAY • Guardian’s Android App of the Week • Gizmodo’s App Deal of the Day • Outside Magazine: The Best City Guide App for your Phone • Also featured in BBC, The Telegraph, PC Magazine, TNW, ProductHunt and others GET IN TOUCH WITH US Check out our web planner: http://www.tripomatic.com Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Tripomatic_com Like us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/TripomaticCom Contact our support team: team@tripomatic.com To access 1000+ destinations worldwide, download the full-fledged Tripomatic app for free. Available at http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tripomatic
release_text: ✓ Enjoy the brand new design. ✓ Use Tripomatic offline. ✓ Book your hotel instantly from the app. ✓ Enjoy beautiful custom made maps. ✓ Enjoy beautiful custom made maps including Vaporetto stops.

app_name: Sajde KZ - prayer times for KZ

release_text: v2.1.1 - quick buttons to turn on/off sound notifications - watch ads to support project - fixed: volume level; - fixed: athan not playing on samsung android 5.0 (restart the device after update) v2.1 - add a widget on your home and lock screens - ability to choose athan (muazzin) - ability to adjust volume level

description: Handrite note is an intuitive handwriting note app that serves as your sticky note, to-do list, memo pad and journal - all at the touch of your finger. Never wade through crumpled pieces of paper, lose important flashes of inspiration or let an unreliable autocorrect impede your speed of thought again. ~~~~~WHO USES HANDRITE NOTE?~~~~~ People who have a need to capture thoughts and ideas quickly, clearly and accurately. ~~~~~HOW HANDRITE NOTE WORKS~~~~~ Write in the spacious "zoomed area" and watch your words appear in the body of your note page. Handrite note does not try to “recognize” your handwriting. Instead, it simply captures your strokes exactly as you drew them. This avoids the tedious task of having to “train” the app to read your handwriting as well as the interpretation errors that still occur. It also means that you can sketch symbols, numbers, pictures, mathematical equations, etc in your notes. ~~~~~Support us, buy Handrite note PRO~~~~~ * Unlimited notebooks * export your note as PDF * Continuous writing, so you can write as fast as with pen and paper. * More paper style options for your note page. ~~~~~FEATURES~~~~~ Copy & Paste text and pictures (even from other apps) Freely edit and format your handwritten page with spaces, carriage returns and backspace delete of entries Organize notes by notebook, date, label and title Desktop widget for instant access and for use as sticky note Instantly switch between handwriting and the software keyboard whenever necessary Make your notes and memos beautiful with professionally designed paper styles Customizable pen styles, including a unique variable thickness line setting, makes your writing look as beautiful as from a fine fountain pen Insert images in the body of your note page Reliable auto-save so you never lose your note Help us translate We'd appreciate if you would like to translate Handrite Note into your language. Here is the translating project you can start with: http://crowdin.net/project/handrite
release_text: Fix a issue caused FC in some devices.

description: Create amazing videos with special effects with your choice of music. Make videos that you’ll be proud to share with your friends ! Create cool home videos in retro and cartoon style. Have you ever wondered how people create those funny animated videos ? Now you can record them too with new Stop Motion feature (available as an extra Pack). To use it Enable Stop Motion mode, set duration of each fragment and pause between recordings. Once Enabled it will start recording the video with short fragments and delay between recordings giving you time for re-positioning an object or person. You don’t have to be a video editor or know anything about video editing at all. You don't need professional camera and video editor software. Pick up a song, select from a number of effects and filters and start recording. No need to wait to see the result, you can even change the effects as you record the movie ! ★ More than 50 effects in total, numerous effects for free: Film, Ghost, Cartoon, Cinematic, Stroboscope, Thermal, Mirror, Neon and others ★ Select mp3 song on your device for the video or use microphone ★ Pause/resume record of the video to change the effect and scene ★ Start Timer allows you to delay the recording of each clip and gives you time to get prepared for recording ★ AutoPause let's you pause recording automatically without touching the button on the phone ★ Fast forward mode ("2x" button) ★ Create animated videos with Stop Motion feature ★ Export to Media Gallery in mp4 format. Look for this option under the Share button ★ Built-in player to watch recorded movies ★ Support for back and frontal camera ★ Share and upload to Youtube, Facebook and other services It's easy to use. Give it a try and see how you perform as music video star ! If you experience problems/crashes please let us know by email and we will look into the problem. Thank you. Instructions & Recommendations: - VideoFX requires a lot of CPU/GPU power. On some devices you may get low-fps and jerky videos. If so, try decreasing resolution on the settings page. - Please note that at the moment the app supports only mp3 tracks! It won't accept audio in other formats (wma, mp4a, ogg etc)! Your music should be stored on your device! You can reset audio source to microphone in the settings or by hitting the music button when it's overlapped by a small red "cross" icon. - Video recording requires a lot of free space on your built-in/SD card. The app will warn if free space on your SD falls below 300M and will block or stop recording if it falls below 100M. - STOP MOTION, 2X (FAST FORWARD), AUTO PAUSE REQUIRE AUDIO TRACK! Important Message for Parents This application includes the option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand. Use of Open Source and Free Software VideoFX uses the following software: - FFmpeg ( http://ffmpeg.org ) licensed under the LGPLv2.1 or later ( http://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/lgpl-2.1.html ) - libjpeg-turbo ( http://www.libjpeg-turbo.org ) licensed under the BSD-compatible license ( http://www.libjpeg-turbo.org/About/License )
release_text: V2.3.13 (build 236) - Fixed: export never finishes on some devices. - Fixed: sporadic camera errors on some devices - Many other bug fixes and stability improvements V 2.3.10 (build 223) - Fixed not working export on devices running Lollipop !!! - Fixed performance issues on some devices (Galaxy S3, Note 4 etc) - Now VideoFX can be installed on SD - Improved video quality on the majority of devices - Other bug fixes and improvements

description: Snapdeal - Your Partner in Growth & Success : Snapdeal brings you Seller Mobile App 4.0 – the latest, the best, and the most convenient in the world of seller apps. It’s redefined. It’s redesigned.A perfect companion in your journey to elevate to the next level of selling and grow your business on Snapdeal. How it’s Wow! • All new Orders feature will keep you updated of your orders and returns by the second. No more missing shipment dates, no more letting your ratings fall. • Go viral! Share your products on Snapdeal on your social network and drive sales. • Scan/Search and find items to sell. • Upgraded inventory and price update functionality will ensure that you stay competitive and go never out of stock. • Use the Snapdeal recommended price to make your products irresistible for the customers. • Powerful payment module will guarantee that you are in charge of every detail of your money transactions. Easily navigate to understand linked transactions. Get alerts of new payments in real time. • Queries, no worries! Raise queries and reply to them with your app. It’s synced seamlessly across your web and mobile app. • View both SD+ and NonSD+ ratings separately. Now always know what’s best for your business. • One-click helpline. Call our seller helpline with one click if you face any issue. Download the app, explore its new features, and share your valuable feedback.
release_text: Your wish is our command! Developed on the basis of your feedback to us, we proudly present to you Snapdeal’s new Seller App, designed with only one goal in mind - Sellers Convenience. Now your Snapdeal Seller App comes with these new power-packed features: • Real time Orders with status • Raise and reply to query • Improved experience on Price & Inventory panel, Payments panel and Sell using search/barcode feature. • Best app performance and response time

description: * Requires Rocket Player 3.0 or higher This Android app is a theme or skin app, which transforms the look of Rocket Player, our Android music player application. Once this app is installed, the free Rocket Player application will be capable of switching themes to the “Material Dark” theme in the settings.

description: Travel Expense helps you to record your expense during traveling, i.e. on a business trip, an out of the office appointment or a person vacation. [Features] 1. Display total amount of travel expense in home currency and local currency. 2. Expense report in csv, html and excel xml 3. Export/Email expense report 4. Backup and restore database to SD card, Dropbox™ and Google Docs 5. Auto backup database to SD card when exiting the app 6. Auto backup database to Dropbox™ when exiting the app 7. Manageable currency 8. Configurable date, time format. 9. Add new record with default value. 10. Password protection 11. Default email address for receiving report 12. Add new expense with default value 13. Camera receipt 14. Sorting, Filtering data 15. Share database with multiple devices by using Dropbox™ Available languages (more coming soon) • English • 中文 • Italiano (Paolo Stefani) • Français (Jean-Marie) • Español (Paolo Stefani) ※ If you like the app, then please give us a good rating as the driving force behind our continued development, thank you. ※ Since we can't reply reviews in the market, if you have any suggestions or questions please mail to our mailbox directly. For market reviews, please just leave your rating and cheers, thanks again. kw: travel costs, business expenses, travel expense, expense travel, travel and expense, reimbursement, allowance, finance manager, personal finance, track, expense, expenses

Have you ever spent lots of time by finding your mobile phone? Or have you already forgotten where is your SmartWatch 2? If you haven't lost both of them and you are in Bluetooth range (about 10 metres), you are lucky! Just use this app and find your second device! It is simple! Features: - find your mobile phone or tablet using your SW2 - find your SW2 using mobile phone or tablet - choose a ringtone for Android device - use widget for faster manipulation Attention: Before use, try to execute finding your SmartWatch. If SmartWatch won't start to vibrate, please execute app on your SmartWatch and after that it will work correctly. Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2

app_name: ドコモ ドライブネットナビ（カーナビ）
description: おかげさまで累計150万ダウンロード突破！！ (*1) ドコモ ドライブネットナビ（docomo DriveNetNavi）は、ドコモが提供するドライバー向けのカーナビアプリです。 ◆通信を利用していつでも最新地図でドライブ！ ◆見やすさにこだわった地図表示！ ・複数の車線が複雑に交わる迷いやすい交差点や、高速道路の分岐や出口を分かりやすいイラストで案内します。 ・高速道路の本線上や出口料金所にあるETCレーンを実際の案内看板より早くイラスト表示します。 ◆リアルタイムな渋滞情報！ ・「カーナビ用センサーユニット01」を利用することで、リアルタイムな渋滞情報を取得して、渋滞情報を考慮したルートをご提案します。 ◆ドライブに役立つ情報をリアルタイムに入手！ ・周辺のガソリンスタンドを検索して、価格の安い順に表示します。 ・周辺の駐車場を検索して「空き状況」を表示、駐車料金や営業時間などもご案内します。 ・全国に配置されているオービス情報や取締り情報をドライバーへ提供し、安全なドライブをサポートします。 ◆音声による簡単操作！ ・「近くのコンビニを教えて！」や「自宅までの案内をお願い！」のように自然に話しかけるだけで、目的地や周辺施設の検索、渋滞情報など、最適な提案をしてくれます。 ◆圏外でも案内が可能！ ・地図をダウンロードしているので、電波が届かない場所でも案内が可能です。 (*1)ダウンロード数はdocomo Application Manager、GooglePlay、AppStoreの合計です。 【ご利用にあたって】 全ての機能をご利用いただくには「ドコモ ドライブネットサービス」のご契約、「カーナビ用センサーユニット01」などのドコモ ドライブネット対応機器のご購入が必要です。 ※「ドコモ ドライブネットサービス」は初回お申込みから31日間無料です。 https://docomo-drivenet.jp/pub/promotion/smt/ddn_smt_promotion.html ※「カーナビ用センサーユニット01」については、以下のサイトをご確認ください。 https://docomo-drivenet.jp/pub/promotion/smt/ddn_smt_promotion_folder.html 【ご注意事項】 ※ドコモ ドライブネットナビアプリのご利用(アプリケーションのダウンロード/バージョンアップ時等を含みます)によっては大容量のデータを送受信し、パケット通信料が高額になりますので、｢パケットパック/パケット定額サービス｣などのご利用を強くおすすめします。 ※ドコモ ドライブネット提供のため、当社はお客様の現在地情報を取得することがあります。 ※本アプリケーションでは外部サイトへアクセスする箇所がございます。 ※ドコモ ドライブネットナビアプリのご利用にあたっては、当社が定めるドコモ ドライブネット利用規約、本アプリに係るアプリケーション・プライバシーポリシーおよび注意事項をよくお読みいただき、その全ての条件に同意いただく必要があります。 ※パイオニア製スマートフォンリンク アプリユニットおよびAVメインユニットと組み合わせてご使用になる場合は最新バージョンのLinkwith ランチャーアプリをご使用ください。 ※その他、以下の｢ドコモのホームページ｣に記載の内容を必ずご確認ください。 https://www.nttdocomo.co.jp/service/information/drive_net/drive_net_navi/notice/index.html 【対応機種】 対応機種についてはドコモのホ－ムページをご確認ください。 https://www.nttdocomo.co.jp/service/information/drive_net/drive_net_navi/compatible_model/index.html 【対応OS】 Android 2.1(*1)、2.2、2.3、3.2、4.0、4.1、4.2(*2)(*3)(*4)、4.3(*2)、4.4 (*1) T-01Cは対応していません。 (*2) フォントサイズによっては画面が崩れる場合があります。 (*3) SC-01Eの「拡大表示」、「通常表示」の切替には対応していません。 (*4) N-05Eは端末を開き片方の画面で利用可能です。 【アプリケーション・プライバシーポリシー】 お客様がこのアプリケーションを利用されるにあたり、携帯電話内及び、携帯電話に接続された機器の次の情報を外部送信します。 ■外部送信する情報 　①端末識別番号(IMEI)及び機種名称 　②各種センサ情報（GPSセンサ、加速度センサ、ジャイロセンサ） 　③音声入力発話内容 　④検索地点情報 　⑤お客様車両登録情報（長さ、幅、高さ ） ■利用目的 　①本サービス提供の際に端末を識別するため 　②位置情報、移動状態に合わせたサービスを提供するため 　③発話内容を解析し、入力に応じたサービスを提供するため 　④入力内容に応じたサービスを提供するため 　⑤入力内容に応じたサービスを提供するため ■第三者提供等の有無 　当社、パイオニア株式会社及び、パイオニアグループ会社は、②各種センサ情報（GPSセンサ、加速度センサ、ジャイロセンサ）を個人を特定できないよう加工した統計データとして、第三者へ提供及び、交通情報として提供する場合があります。 より詳細なアプリケーションプライバシーポリシー全文は、全体版にてご確認いただけます。 https://docomo-drivenet.jp/pub/dnn/app.html ※デベロッパー情報にあるお問い合わせメールアドレス宛には空メールをお送りください。 　自動応答により、お問い合わせフォームへのURLをお送り致します。

description: Ma armastan sind Live Taustapilt on ideaalne valik igaühele, kellel magus, suur, pea-over-kontsad sellist armastust? See uhiuus nutitelefoni app teeb armuda iga kord, kui pilk oma telefoni! Väljenda oma pakkumine tundeid kaunistavad oma mobiiltelefoni ekraani kauneimaid südame pilte. HD tausta pilte armas roosa, punane ja lilla südamed teeb telefoni ilus ja jahe. Armastus on kõikjal teie ümber, nii et miks ei pane see oma nutitelefoni ekraan ?! Lae see kohe, täiesti tasuta ja öelda Ma armastan sind kõige romantilisem viis! Ma armastan sind Live Taustapilt on kõige hämmastav tüdruk taustal app leiad turul! Sa väga armastan armas roosa südamed kaetud sära! Tähistatakse armastust kõige suurepärane võimalus allalaadimisega see uus armastus südamed tausta Live Taustapilt. On aeg, romantikat ja sweet love, nii et ei oota enam ja alla laadida parim uus app turul! Sul on puhutud kaugusel imeline roosa ja lilla südamed tausta, mis sobib suurepäraselt iga ekraani! Nautige ilus romantiline pilte armas südamed, kaunistatud sära ja kuld! Iga stiilne tüdruk teab, et Live Taustapilt, nagu see on must kui sa tahad olla tõeline trendilooja! Mine trendikas ja saada see lahe Live Taustapilt app kohe, sest nüüd on saadaval tasuta allalaadimiseks! * Android ™ on kaubamärk Google Inc. * See app ei ole seotud ega heaks kiitnud Samsung.

Create villages, forge bonds, conquer worlds! Fight with thousands of other players online in this medieval strategy game. Tribal Wars is a medieval strategy game which offers complex strategies and fun with a simple gameplay. Upgrade your village to a mighty fortress and raise your army. Band together with other players to form a powerful tribe and lead your troops into battle. Conquer the villages of your enemies and expand your empire. Will your tribe prevail? FEATURES • Free to play! • Build and upgrade more than 15 unique buildings • Raise an army by recruiting many different defense and offensive units • Appoint a paladin and find mighty equipment. • Attack, plunder and conquer your opponents in real time while defending your kingdom against attackers – real PvP. • Band together with other players to form a tribe and declare war on your enemies. • Many different worlds with altered victory conditions. • Play via your smartphone or via your browser.

You are a tramp, and you are thirsty. They made a party, but they didn’t invite you. It’s ok because in Russia, drinks fall from the sky and you just have to grab them, as much as you can. Unfortunately, pianos, Molotov’s, dancers, submarines and other obstacles fall from the sky as well. Fortunately, if you drank enough, you can puke to destroy them. Because drinking is your passion, you will go on and on visiting Russia from the streets to the Kremlin, from the sewers to Baïkonour. - FREE ! - 20 evolving Levels ! - 4 Worlds to explore in Russia ! - Reach the max combo and high score on each level ! - Russian Roulette : Increase your score, win a bonus, or lose everything !

Hai voglia di una Birra ? Perchè accontentarsi della solita birra commerciale del bar quando magari ti trovi nelle vicinanze di un birrificio dove gustare ottima birra artigianale? Con l'app gratuita "Birrifici Italiani" potrai individuare i birrifici e i brewpub (birrifici con pub annesso) e con un semplice click potrai farti guidare dal tuo navigatore preferito! Il database, in continuo aggiornamento, al 04/04/2015, e' composto di: - 441 microbirrifici - 169 brewpub Caratteristiche: - Trova i locali vicino a te - Trova i locali in un punto specifico del territorio italiano (long click sulla mappa) - Ricerca per nome - Ricerca per regione e/o provincia - Definisci il raggio di ricerca - Collegamenti a Facebook, Twitter e Google+ - Collegamento a Streetview per una migliore visione della zona - Contatta telefonicamente o via mail il locale con un click - Condividi via mail i locali - Valuta e commenta i locali - Segnala nuovi microbirrifici o brewpub E' richiesto un collegamento a Internet. Grazie a Davide del sito www.microbirrifici.org che ha reso possibile la realizzazione di questa utilissima (almeno per me! ;) ) app ! ******************* IMPORTANTE ************ Invito tutti a scrivermi in caso di problemi e/o segnalazioni! Grazie e cheers! :) You want a beer? Why settle for the usual beer commercial bar when maybe you are near a brewery where you can enjoy good beer? With the free app "Breweries Italian" you can identify the breweries and brewpubs (brewery with pub attached) and with one click you can be guided by your favorite browser!   The database, continuously updated, to 04.04.2015, and 'consists of: - 441 microbreweries - 169 brewpub Characteristics: - Find the premises near you - Find the premises at a specific point of the Italian territory (long click on the map) - Search by name - Search by region and / or province - Define search radius - Links to Facebook, Twitter and Google+ - Connecting to Streetview for a better view of the area - Contact your local phone or mail with a click - Share via email locals - Rate and comment locals - Report new microbreweries or brewpubs It 'requires a connection to the Internet. Thanks to David's site www.microbirrifici.org that made possible the realization of this very useful (at least for me!;)) App! ******************* IMPORTANT ************ I encourage everyone to write me in case of problems and / or suggestions! Thanks and cheers! :)

NoteZart is a fun music notes game, music sight reading trainer. It helps you learn music notes easily, improve your sight reading and train your musical ear. Clefs: - Treble Clef - Bass Clef Modes: - Learn Notes Mode - Sight Reading Mode - Hear Notes Mode In the game's main screen you can select Treble or Bass clefs with different levels. There are 68 levels in total. In each level, different pieces of music notes come along with the three music mode options; Learn Notes Mode, Sight Reading Mode and Hear Notes Mode. The music notes flows on the screen with the relevant piano sounds. Learn Notes Mode and Sight Reading Mode will teach you music notes and train your music sight reading, while Hear Notes Mode improves your musical ear. Players have to hit the correct music note on the piano keys below the staff ledger. If it is the right music note, the music note turns into green. In the Learn Notes Mode, where player learns music notes, if player hits the wrong music note or doesn't hit any piano keys, the correct music note appears on the pop up screen. In the Sight Reading Mode, in which player improves music sight reading, the speed of the game increases in time; as a music note in 4 seconds, in 2 seconds and finally in 1 second! In the Hear Notes Mode, musical ear training for the player; the player just hears the piano sound of the music note, but not sees the music note on the screen. After you complete the 68 levels, you will have learned all the music notes of Treble and Bass clefs, while you improve your sight reading and train musical ear! Moreover you can go settings from the main menu and select one of the music notations below: - Southern and Eastern Europeans (do re mi fa sol la si) - English (C D E F G A B) - North European (C D E F G A H) - Bizantine (Ni Pa Vu Ga Di Ke Zo) - Indian (Sa Re Ga Ma Pa Dha Ni).

And color of the flower, with search function by plant height. I understand features of the plant in the detailed images of each part flowers, leaves, and fruit. description: Instant Celebrity Makeover is an one-touch photo editing app that lets you try out different celebrity looks. It is simple. It is elegant. It is instant. Try out your favorite celebrity looks with a tap of finger! All you have to do is upload a photo, adjust a few points that define your facial features, and then tap on a celebrity look. Instant Celebrity Makeover is a quick photo editing app that lets you apply makeup as well as the hairstyle of a popular celebrity. When you are happy with your makeover, you can save your new look on your device, email to your friends, and share on Facebook. Our celebrity database is growing everyday and you will be able to update as soon as it becomes available! Some of the celebrity looks include: Kim Kardashian, Selena Gomez, Taylor Swift, Jennifer Aniston, Katy Perry, Miley Cyrus, Rihanna and more! This app is a must have! Try it out today! ★ Celebrity Makeup ★ Each celebrity look comes with a combination of makeup that is visible on them. The type of makeup includes eye shadow, eye liner, mascara, blush, lipstick, lip gloss, lip liner, contour, foundation, and many more. We have a team of makeup artists who perfect the makeup combination for each look. All you have to do is tap on your favorite celebrity look. It is that simple! ★ Celebrity Hairstyles ★ Each celebrity look comes with their hairstyle perfectly cropped for you to try-on. If the hairstyle is not perfectly fitted to your face, you can use one finger to reshape or two fingers to move, zoom, and rotate. If you prefer to not show the hairstyle, there is an option for you to turn on and off the hairstyle. ★ Features ★ ✔ Try on new celebrity looks on your own photo (supports gallery, camera, and Facebook) ✔ 100+ celebrity looks to choose from ✔ State-of-Art facial recognition technology ✔ Before vs. After comparison ✔ Share results with friends and family ★ Quick FAQ ★ Q. Face detection seems very off... A. In order to benefit from our latest facial recognition technology, you must be connected to internet. Q. Face point adjustment is difficult... A. Did you know you don’t have to touch the point to move it? Say you want to move a point on your lip. You don’t have to touch ‘on’ the point. You can simply touch the ‘near-by’ region and drag your finger to move that point. There will be a line drawn from that point to your finger in order to assist you with the process. This should make it easier for you to adjust the point! Q. What do you mean by “Would you like to save this photo as private model”? A: By saving a photo as a model photo, you can access it quickly from your model library. This photo *will not* be shared with anyone else. You can remove this model as well so don’t be afraid to use this feature! Q. I want to know the name of the makeup products I have applied. A. When you choose to share your new look through email, you will have a list of makeup products automatically included in your email body. Some of them will even have links to the products! Q. Where are the photos saved to? A. Saved photos can be found in ModiFace folder here: /mnt/sdcard/Pictures/ModiFace/. ✔ Support: Android 2.2 (Froyo) to Android 4.x (Ice Cream Sandwich & Jelly Bean & KitKat) ✔ Publisher: ModiFace - the Virtual Makeover experts

The app is a photo editor with a lot of animal faces! You can place the famous world's animals over your photos! Take a funny picture of you, switch your face and share photos with your friends. Choose between wild, zoo or fantastic animals: * Unicorns * Famous birds * Angry cats and many others Be creative with a lot of effects and filters!
Dandelions field, beautiful live wallpaper. Setting the wallpaper, you can watch as your screen floats down dandelions shine sunlight. You can also choose the background. Enjoy!

** Read a super cool adventure story, play interactive games and colour with Tree Fu Tom! Turn the magic on with Tom and his friends in this deluxe storybook adventure based on the hit TV show on CBeebies. Kids will get ready to Tree Fu Go as they read & play with Tom to avoid slime-spitting weeds, sticky spiderwebs and finally meet a not-so-scary spider on their way to find the lost squizzle, their favourite game! Tree Fu Tom Squizzle Quest was developed by leading kid’s developer, Cupcake Digital, in partnership with FremantleMedia. Features: - An interactive story filled with special powers, friendship, surprising activities and a thrilling journey from the popular TV show - Tom takes kids through Tree Fu ‘movement magic’ - Four fun-filled games: Tree Fu Hero: Match scrolling coloured buttons to gain power Leafboard Fun: Leafboard through Treetopolis to collect magic with Tom Slimeweed Maze: Guide your new friends through the forest to find the missing squizzle Power Counting: Learn numbers with Squirtum to free him from the spiderweb! - Colour awesome scenes using paints, spray, crayons and stickers, plus so much more! Cupcakedigital.com provides free downloadable activities to further the educational learning at home. Parents’ and Teachers’ Guides are also available with helpful tips for getting children ready for school and for utilizing apps to reinforce learning in and out of the classroom. Coppa: We care about your kids and their safety. This app contains gated areas to ensure that only adults can access anything that would take you outside of the app. To view our full app privacy policy, please visit www.cupcakedigital.com/appsprivacy

We are very familiar with the default alarm which will sound on a time we set earlier. This app add more fun to it. Besides the sound, we can configure to have a picture or even a video to play along when the alarm sound. Important point to note: - Only certain video format can be played. To be sure, those video captured using the stock Camcorder in the smart-phone are most likely to work. The application support English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese display.

Mobile GIS Barcode Scanner developed exclusively for the latest Trimble GNSS handhelds. Compatibility: - Trimble GeoExplorer Geo 7X - Trimble GeoExplorer Geo 6000 - Trimble Juno 3B/3D + Trimble TerraSync Professional 5.00+ software Easy to use! Start scanning barcodes in 4 simple steps: 1. Download and install the TerraCode app & "ROI QR Scanner" (free; search "snaptqr" on Google Play) if you don't use any scanning app yet 2. Turn on Bluetooth on your Android and GNSS device 3. Create a new Bluetooth connection & Configure an External Sensor in the Trimble TerraSync field software (follow the in-app instructions) 4. Scan and transfer barcodes to TerraSync Where are barcodes? - Utility meters (water and electricity meters, ...) - Poles (electricity and light poles, ...) - Traffic signs - Barcode labels on a public or a private asset

Choose the horse you like the most and gallop to victory! In this game we have: Race against your friends and other people around the world! Leaderboards - Compare your score to your friends! Simple controls! Beautiful horses - Choose between four beautiful horses! Addicting music! Jump on the horse and lets race!

description: Amazing 3D BLACKJACK! Play one of the TOP graphical BlackJack games on the Android market. Our Blackjack game naturally has a 'one-more-go' feel to it and as the game is so easy to play, it becomes quite a potent and addictive mix. Enjoy watching the real life look and feel of 3D cards and poker chips tossed on and off the table. Quickly take control of your strategy with the user friendly interface with options such as DEAL,DOUBLE BET,DOUBLE DOWN,HIT,REPEAT BET,SPLIT,STAND,UNDO,CLEAR ALL. - Play 3 Hands at once. - Game is played with 1 deck - Dealer must stand on 17 - Player may double down on 9,10 or 11 - Split only once per hand - Double down is allowed after split - Split hands are eligible for Blackjack - Blackjack pays 3 to 2 - Insurance pays 2 to 1 if dealer has Blackjack - A win pays evens Features: -3D CARDS -3D CHIPS -3D POKER TABLE -QUICK AND INTUITIVE CONTROL INTERFACE -SETTINGS TO RESET YOUR CREDITS -GAME REMEMBERS credits; so you can play where you left off -SMOOTH PLAY -GREAT GRAPHICS NOTICE: These games are for entertainment purposes only. No real money can be won or lost. Good Luck and Have Fun!

This theme requires CM10/11 or an AOSP based ROM with Theme engine. Its purpose is to enhance the Android UI without compromising the vanilla look. NOT suitable for Lollipop! The Dark version features the following inverted apps: Contacts, Messaging, Gmail, Email, Calendar, Google Now, Google Talk and Play Store. HOW TO APPLY: Install the app, go to settings/themes of your ROM, select system theme and REBOOT. After that apply this theme and reboot again. If you get: "Sorry, this theme is missing assets for your device's screen size", APPLY IT ANYWAY. Stock battery is available as "circle" in settings for AOKP/Liquid. description: A free photo effects Maker application to make mirror photos, twins pictures or clone your self in one photo. It's an easy-to-use, yet feature-rich app, which enables you to transform even a quite ordinary looking photo into a work of art. Mirror photo effect can produce a surprisingly large range of striking visual illusions. Engage your imagination and see what you can create with it. Features: 1. Add various effects into the photo 2. Variety of layouts for photo twins effects - incredibly easy 3. Editor allows you to move, swap, rotate, zoom, sketch, etc in the photo lab 4. Add text, delete text, emoticons and clip art, many sticker to your photos and collages 5. High resolution, high quality output. 6. Save the photo in SD card and share via Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Flickr, Picasa, Blogger, Tumblr, Google Plus, email, etc

Camera+ is the camera APP which provides the most professional camera features and is very easy to operate. You could use it to take high quality photos whether you are a professional or a beginner . Features: 1) Shooting mode: Anti-shake mode, Voice Shutter mode, Countdown mode, Continuous mode, Normal mode. 2) Photo Filter: More than 20 real-time effects such as Lomo, Sepia, Symmetry, Light tunnel... 3) The photo post processing: Adjustment of the effects of photo environment, portrait, weather effects and other post-processing. 4) Fisheye Camera. 5) Photo sharing: Share to be Facebook, Twitter etc. Various functions and effects! description: ReSound Unite Phone Clip+ (released Dec 2012) is REQUIRED to use this app. Other required devices: ReSound wireless-enabled hearing aids. Please go to App Support for more information. ReSound Control is smart control of your hearing aids With the Phone Clip+, ReSound Control lets you use your mobile device for easy overview and remote control of your ReSound wireless hearing aids and ReSound Unite wireless accessories. It’s the ultimate solution for discreet, visual control! Functionality Adjust volume level and change programs on your wireless hearing aids. Adjust volume level on your wireless accessories. Edit and personalize program names. Use the dedicated link screen to overview connections between the app and your hearing aids. A first ReSound Control is the hearing industry’s first fully integrated remote control app for wireless hearing aids and accessories.

description: Trick Shots inc. is a basketball trick shot game with every level completely unique! Test your skills (or luck) on the current 17 levels including house, skyscraper, and even canyon! No more time wasted chasing balls and long drives to different locations, because Trick Shots inc. goes where you go. Try to unlock the six different colored balls by beating certain levels. Thanks for playing! Made with the very powerful Corona SDK!!! About permissions: The permissions are used to download a required expansion file needed so future updates will not take as long to download as the initial download. RevMob ads are displayed to support future updates, so it is for a good cause! Contact at: shluamobilegames@gmail.com
release_text: Version 1.5.1 ~New replay button! Watch the replay of made or missed shots. ~2 new levels ~1 new ball ~no banner ads ~bug fix that causes ball to shoot fast ~other bug fixes ~new back button!

description: You just drink alcohol and want to know your blood alcohol concentration ? Want to know if you can drive ? You will have to give information so that the breathalyzer can determine with maximum accuracy level of alcohol in your blood. Breathalyzer is an application which can give the level of alcohol consumption with some precision. Simply enter your settings , the types of beverages and feed intake whether, to know if you can drive ! The application will show your blood alcohol concentration and the state in which you should be, based on the information you provided . You will also know how long time you can drive ! - Breathalyzer is an application focusing on simplicity, clarity and efficiency. - Breathalyzer is available in several languages. - Breathalyzer is intuitive. information We use the formula of Watson to determine your blood alcohol concentration . Watson's formula is one that helps determine your blood alcohol level with maximum accuracy ! For more information do not hesitate to contact us. Do not hesitate to give us feedback on the Breathalyzer application!
release_text: Patch 1.1: -Improvement of the entry bars, -Adding 5 new languages -Graphical optimization for the smalls resolutions.

description: TRY IT NOW FOR FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM INSIDE THE GAME. Be ready for a blood - curdling adventure in an ancient dracula style vampire castle full of hidden legends, mystery items and dark inhabitants! After the previous house appraisers went insane while evaluating the creepy and twilight object - Malgrey Castle estate, Rockwell and Rockwell decided to send a young and ambitious real estate agent Michael to appraise the cursed property and put it up for sale. Hopefully Michael will have stronger nerves and better luck than his predecessors had while they navigated their way around the twilight eerie castle’s weird and sinister secrets. If he doesn’t go mad hopefully his boss, Mr. Rockwell, won’t drive him crazy. Mr. Rockwell may be frail, but the perpetually discontent old man is planning to visit the premises personally because he believes the estate may help him to find a secret cure for his rare disease. Vampireville is a hidden object, puzzle adventure with three-dimensional characters and dynamic, addictive gameplay. You have to open secret doors and search around twilight rooms, dig through the archives and vampire diaries, catch bats, analyze blood samples, and play golf. You’ll also learn about vampires and ghosts, search the castle's legends and meet a young witch, who will find out your hidden future! Features: - Intriguing plot - Refined graphics and blood chilling soundtrack - Dark three-dimensional characters - Original puzzles, hidden object tasks and mini games - Interesting and humorous conversations Feel the spooky atmosphere of the hidden castle! But beware! It’s full of surprises!

It's time to bring your yellow sticky notes up to date - BugMe! brings all the fun and flexibility of the handy little notes right to your smartphone or tablet. Pin them to a virtual cork board within the app and set alarms and alerts, or use the BugMe! Widget to “Stick” your note on your launcher screen for that extra visual reminder! Main features: MAKE QUICK NOTES - write in digital ink with your finger, or type with the inbuilt keyboard ALARMS & REMINDERS - set alarms and due times on your notes SAVE NOTES TO LAUNCHER - widget for handy sticky notes on your app launcher! SEND YOUR NOTES TO FRIENDS - send notes to friends via Facebook, Twitter or email CUSTOMIZE THE LOOK - huge choice of note colors, papers and ink styles to help you get organized USE YOUR PHOTOS - use your photos as note backgrounds or make notes and marks on your photos MAKE LISTS - use your notes as lists ORGANIZE - drag and drop your notes to rearrange them on the virtual cork board. and more! “There's something to be said for a simple, straightforward note-taking app that borrows from the familiar: sticky notes.” CNet Review BugMe! has been a leading productivity app for smartphones and organizers since 1997 - we're proud that we've replaced so many yellow stickies! If you have feature requests - contact us on Twitter - we’re @bugmeapp and @electricpocket
release_text: With this update we added a large set of fun and usefull note papers allowing you to more easily categorise and distinguish your notes, keeping you even more organized.

description: Host a fully interactive pool table right on your home screen! Beautifully OpenGL rendered billiard balls roll and interact realistically, with high quality highlights and shadows. Full support for portrait and landscape, on both phones and tablets. This free version simulates a game of 6-Ball, with additional game types available in the full version. Swipe the cue ball to interact with the table! If you enjoy this, please support us by buying the full version! It has a full settings screen, allowing full control of all balls on the table, and giving control over felt color and ball appearance, in addition to the game layout you prefer! Plus, adjust physics accuracy for your individual device! TO USE: Home->Long Press->Live Wallpapers

Extract rar and zip files with ease via UnZip! It helps you to extract rar and zip files ( like WinRaR and WinZip ) and view the files easily. Note: UnZip is an add-on of UC Browser, and UC Browser must be installed to use it. How To Use: 1. Open zip/rar files in Download Management and select path. 2. Click “OK” to unzip. 3. Find the extracted files in the selected path location.

Start banking wherever you are FNBT & FCB Mobile Banking for Android! Available to all First National Bank Texas and First Convenience Bankonline banking customers FNBT & FCB Mobile Banking allows you to check balances, make transfers, and find locations. Need to find a Branch or ATM closest to you? FNBT & FCB Mobile Banking allows you to enter a zip code or address and provides you with closest locations on the fly. Available features include: Accounts - Check your latest account balance and search recent transactions by date, amount, or check number. Transfers - Easily transfer cash between your accounts. Locations - Find nearby Branches and ATMs using the search by zip code or address options.
release_text: FNBT & FCB Mobile Banking is proud to provide a NEW user experience for Mobile Banking with improved styles and banking flow.

description: New Material Theme for Droid Wallet!! Droid Wallet is a Money Manager application that lets you track all of your expenses and income so you can see your budget for extra spending! It is the perfect money manager for anyone that is looking to keep a budget and save some cash! Droid Wallet has many features that are easy to use to help you manage your finances efficiently! -Budgets -- Create a budget for any expense category and the desired time range. Go to the Budgets tab to make sure you are staying under the budget set! -Recurring Transactions! Setup up bills such as rent, insurance, utilities and income such as your pay checks to be automatically added each month, week, or how ever often they occur! -Manage your expenses and your income in separate lists! -View expenses or income by the transaction category or date! -Categorize your expenses and income. You can change the names, change the colors, create new categories and delete old ones! -Order your categories in any way you like and choose a color to easily distinguish between them! -Easily repeat transactions! Press on any transaction and select repeat! That's It! -Backup your information to the SD Card. You can also select AUTO export to make sure there's always a backup file on the SD Card. If you'd like to view your data in a spreadsheet you can also save it as a CSV file! For the auto export feature: Go to MENU -> Settings -> Database Management to set it up! -Dropbox integration. Can now save your information into your DropBox account. -Password (PIN) Protection! E-mail is sent in case your forget your PIN. Enter your email under Settings to enable this feature! Budgets can be set up to be weekly, every two weeks, every four weeks, monthly, bi-monthly, or every two months. NOTE: In case you want a budget for Free Spending. I'd suggest creating a new expense category for Free Spending. Any expense that you deem to be free spending, add under that category instead. Please feel free to e-mail me with any suggestions, comments, and questions!
release_text: v3.5.3 -Added: You can select which tabs load at start up. Go to Settings -> Displayed Tabs. If you'd like to view a tab that is not loaded at start up. Go to MENU -> Show Hidden Tabs. -Fixed error exporting CSV -Fixed error hitting cancel does not delete a transaction -Fixed other bugs

description: ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ This ONLY a DICTIONARY for " Pink Emoji Keyboard " app. ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ You just need to change the language in Emoji Keyboard to use this dictionary. Setp1: Go to Pink Emoji Keyboard settings; Setp2: Choose Input languages. Want to input Emoji on Android，FREE download Pink Emoji Keyboard!

Awesome 3D graphics, excellent music and sound effects and superb physics are the winning key for this title. Be steady and stay balanced! Features: - 5 challenging tracks - Superb real-time physics - Get pass the levels with different racing styles. - Accelerometer and touch screen controls - Vibration bounce feedback - Accelerated 3rd generation OGL ES 2.0 graphic - Original music and funny sound effects Instructions: Movement: tilt gently the device in the 4 directions to guide the ball. Jump: make the ball jump by touching anywhere the screen, beware of bounces, when ball is in air, it won't jump easily! Calibration: touch gently the top right corner with the device flat, or in comfortable position Hydrogen: you have a limited boost for each course, press the bottom left corner button to boost the speed! This game actually supports the following video resolutions: 1280x800 1280x752 1280x720 1196x720 1024x600 1024x580 1024x552 1024x768 960x540 800x480 848x480 854x480 480x320
release_text: - added support for 848x480 displays - added support for 854x480 displays - added support for 960x540 displays

description: You don't want to unlock your device each time to see your upcoming calendar events? Then you should install LockscreenCalendar! This app puts your upcoming appointments directly on your lockscreen! It works on every lockscreen, that normally displays the next upcoming alarm, like all standard Android lockscreens. Samsung and HTC Sense lockscreen aren't such ones - nothing I can do about that until Samsung & HTC implement this standard feature in their modified lockscreens. You need to press "update" at least once to make the app load your calendar and set the text on the lockscreen. If you want the time of the events to be shown, change the date format in the app's settings (HH:mm for example). Again: DOES NOT WORK ON SAMSUNG, HTC OR OTHER MODIFIED LOCKSCREENS!! Only stock AOSP Android 2.x!! In newer Android versions the lockscreen layout changed dramatically so this app won't work on these - there is nothing I can do about that! ------------ Feature graphic icon: © spiderflystudios.com App icon: © aboutpixel.de Bernd Boscolo ------------ Permissions: READ_CALENDAR - needed to read the calendar WRITE_SETTINGS - needed to write on the lockscreen RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED - needed to start refresh timer after boot
release_text: 1.3.2: bugfix 1.3.1: fix: still showing one event less then setup on some devices 1.3: - fix: showing too less events in some cases - fix: not showing events without end time - fix: showing events from the past day - should now also work on Android 2.1

description: The New Times is a Moscow-based, Russian language, political weekly that publishes uncensored news, exclusive stories, and in-depth investigations on the most significant aspects of Russia’s political, economic, and cultural life. It provides quality, up-to-date, vital information to those, who are in the position of making important daily political and business decisions The content is produced by professional journalists as well as leading Russian and international experts. Each new user receives one FREE issue of The New Times.

* Talkback with Explore by touch mode is supported! The operation is a little differenet from Talkback is disabled. First, touch the panel and wait a moment until short vibration. Then operate filick and so on. We are sorry no longer we can not support long press as showing big dialog. * About Smart Braille It is designed to test Android applications that can be entered by typing the letters and Braille using tap or flick. * How to use Smart Braille Smart Braille is divided into three stages from the top down Braille and 2 points each. Top, middle, bottom, in order to enter it, you can enter a character in three convenient operation. The operation under than half of the screen. The input to operations and tap operations flick. Their operation and configuration of points and relations are as follows 4. 1. Flicks left, when there is point to the left. 2. Flicks right, when there is point to the right. 3. Flicks down, when there are both points. 4. Tap, when there is no point. Here is an example. Space is three taps. "A" is a left flick, tap, and tap. Also, keep in touch with your finger for a few seconds left, displays the string you entered, and read aloud. (support only when Talkback is off) Additionally, you can delete characters. When you operate vertical rub a few times, the last character is deleted. When you operate horizontal rub a few times, all characters are deleted. * And more... -Please setup TTS(TextToSpeech) before using Smart Braille. -You can choose Japanese or English grade2(not 100%) braille. ------------------------------------------------------ Copyright (c) 2011,2012 Social welfare corporation Ouun-Kai, Director, Sadao Hasegawa and TM Laboratory Shigeo Mutoh All Rights Reserved.
release_text: v0.10.1 cancelling BodyBraille(our Talkback). v0.9.1 refactering preferences. if long press, show text dialog and vibrate braille. v0.9.0 support Talkback and Explore by touch mode. v0.7.0 stereo sound vibration(2 points body braille) is supported. v0.6.4 beep frequencies are selectable. v0.6.3 Beep and vibration are synchronized. v0.6.2 Beep vibration is supported. v0.6.1 added some settings.

description: A free, simple and colorful game where you control Zvyzduk which you need to collect as many stars. ************* HOW TO PLAY: - Zvyzduk begins its journey to the planet and jumping up on the platforms until you get to the rocket. - On the way up collect the stars, they will let you increase the number of points. - Beware of flying meteorites enough to touch them to the game is over. - Platforms are moving at different speeds, and some destroyed. Be careful! - The achievements can be found in the menu HIGHSCORE. *********** TIPS: - If the platform is too far from you can try to jump out of the screen and you will appear on the other side! ********* FEATURES: - Easy management. - Nice graphics. Enjoy the game!

This is a theme for Apex Launcher, Nova Launcher or Go Launcher EX it features custom icons and wallpapers. For Go Launcher it has custom menus and folders. It works on tablets and supports larger icons, see Theme tips below. GO LAUNCHER ISSUE: Go Launcher is no longer applying my themes at the moment. A work around is to go to Tools --> Preferences --> Icons --> Icon style and select the theme you want under Theme icon, Dock icon and folder icon. ** Themes cannot be launched directly. See Installation instructions below. ** Screen shots are using a 5 x 4 grid. (Menu → Preferences → Screen settings → Grid size) taken on Go Launcher. *** If you find bugs or have suggestions, Please do not post them as comments as I cannot reply to those and solve your issue. *** Please rate the theme. INSTALLATION • Make sure Nova Launcher or Go Launcher EX is compatible with your device and runs on your device before downloading. • Apex Launcher: Go to Apex Settings → Theme Settings → select the theme you just installed. • Nova Launcher: Go to Nova Settings → Look and Feel → select the icon pack of the LC Theme you just installed. • Go Launcher EX: to run, please make sure that Go Launcher EX runs on your device before installing. Once downloaded from the go launcher menu, select themes → Installed and then select LC Theme you just installed and press the Apply button. THEME TIPS • Nova Launcher / Go Launcher EX is required to run. • Themes cannot be run directly, you must apply the theme from a launcher. See instructions in the INSTALLATION section. GO LAUNCHER THEME TIPS • Make sure Nova Launcher or Go Launcher EX runs on your device before installing • If the icons do not update --> Quit Go Launcher and then start it again. --> Also make sure if you have apps on the SD card that the SD card is mounted. If this does not work, uninstall the theme and download and install it again. You will not be charged. • Go Launcher Sphere Effect: To enable the sphere effect as seen on the different themes, go to Go Launcher Preferences --> Effect Settings --> Select Horizontal or Vertical Scroll Effect --> select Sphere. • To move to the SD card you must be running Android OS 2.2 or higher. • To make icons larger go to Menu --> Preferences --> Visual Settings --> Icons --> Icons Size • Sample Tablet settings: https://sites.google.com/site/lcdroiddev/home/tablet-settings NOTE: WeatherBug Elite, Go Clock, Powerful Switchman, HD Widgets, widgetsoid are separate apps available on the Android Market. Widgets seen in some of the themes: • HD Widgets: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=cloudtv.hdwidgets&feature=search_result#?t=W251bGwsMSwxLDEsImNsb3VkdHYuaGR3aWRnZXRzIl0. • Go Clock Widget: https://market.android.com/details?id=smsr.com.acc • Analog Clock Widget: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.gau.go.launcherex.gowidget.clockwidget • Analog Clock Widget: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1107977 • Widgetsoid 2.x: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.jim2 • Powerful Switchman: https://market.android.com/details?id=cn.opda.android.switches • WeatherBug Elite: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.aws.android.elite Please check out my other themes. Weather in screen shot is Weather Bug Elite. Clock is from Analog Clock Collection or Go Clock WIdget Widgets are from Widgetsoid or HD Widgets. Themes cannot be launched directly. See Installation instructions. Keywords: LCDROIDDEV Pink Theme nova apex launcher

description: *DISCLAIMER* Due to Nova Launcher's app drawer background color being black, simply go into your launchers app drawer settings and change the transparency of the background to around 50%. ** WORKS ON LAUNCHER ** - Apex Launcher - ADW Launcher - Nova Launcher - Holo Launcher - Action Launcher - Go Launcher - Smart Launcher ** FEATURES ** - Contains 1200+ icons! - Works on Jelly Bean devices too. IF YOU INCREASE YOUR ICON SIZE THROUGH YOUR LAUNCHER SETTINGS READ THIS: If you apply these icons and then increase the icon size it will make the mask go crazy. Before increasing icon size apply the default launcher theme, resize icons, and then apply this theme. If your icon size is already increased before applying this theme than there is no need to worry and you can apply the theme normally. ** TO APPLY THE THEME ** - Apex Launcher: Go to Apex settings > Theme settings - Nova Launcher: Go to Nova Settings > Look and feel > Icon Theme - ADW Launcher: On the home screen, press MENU > More > ADWSettings > Themes Preferences > Select your theme - Holo Launcher: On the home screen, press MENU > Launcher Settings > Appearance Settings > Icon Theme > Select theme If you have any questions/comments or any requests at all simply email me at maison1020@gmail.com and I promise your questions will be answered and requests will be filled. Remember that not everyone uses the same apps, so if you download this and not all of your icons are themed they can be if you simply email me. I fill requests quickly

description: An indispensable racing game in Android cellphones!!! Gorgeous graphics and smooth game control!!! Challenging helicopter and interesting gameplay!!! Exquisite racing cars!!! You will love it! Rush Racing(The Best Racer ) is a dodge car racing game. The simple game control and cool graphics will bring you an exciting experience of surpass and dodge. You can challenge continually with your favourite racing car. ★Features★ ★★★★★ Limited fuel, experience a feeling of tension and urgence. ★★★★★ Easy to play , use the right and left keys to complete all actions. ★★★★★ Various props,different collacation let you race a farther distance. ★★★★★ Various racing cars, you will have an exciting racing.

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★ Cosmic Constellation! A Cosmic Constellation is a new app that lets you see stars, planets, galaxies, constellations and even satellites. It is easy to use, all you have to do is just stand anywhere and hold your iPhone, iPod touch or iPad up to the sky and Cosmic Constellation will display the names of the stars, planets and other objects you are able to see! Whether it is day or night or even if your view is obscured by clouds, Cosmic Constellation will know which stars, planets, galaxies, constellations and satellites are hiding from your view! It is augmented so if you point your device in the direction of the sky it will show the objects live! So what are you waiting for? Start stargazing now! ★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★ Cosmic Constellation is made available under the GPL and BSD style licensees.A Starry Night is based on the open source code for the app 'SkyMap'.

* 2nd Place winner in Family category of the 2014 LDSTech Gospel App & Game Contest! * This is the free version, so you can try before you buy. The ad-free version you can buy is called "LDS Tweets." A convenient collection of Twitter feeds of interest to members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Includes official accounts from the Church as well as others that are faith promoting. This is especially useful if you're interested in viewing LDS-oriented tweets but don't have a Twitter account or don't want to learn to use Twitter. Currently includes: The LDS Church, Thomas S. Monson, Henry B. Eyring, Dieter F. Uchtdorf, Dallin H. Oaks, M. Russell Ballard, Jeffrey R. Holland, David A. Bednar, Mormon Newsroom, Mormon.org, Mormon Channel, The Friend Magazine, Mormon Messages, LDS Church History, Church History Daily, Mormon Tab. Choir, Meet the Mormons, FamilySearch, HelpingintheVineyard, Create LDS Media, LDSTech, LDS Church News, LDSGeneralConference, Mormon Times, FairMormon, Interpreter, Maxwell Institute, BYU Speeches, LDS Living, LDS Quotes, LDS Messages, LDS.net, LDS Media Talk

ValleyMLS Mobile Real Estate brings the most accurate and up-to-date real estate information right to your mobile device! With ValleyMLS Mobile Real Estate, you have access to all homes for sale or rent and MLS listings throughout the North Alabama area. Use ValleyMLS Mobile Real Estate anytime, anywhere to pull up homes for sale or rent around you using the GPS search, or find homes based on address, city or zip code. ValleyMLS Mobile Real Estate will show you all the details you want to know about a property, including price, features, descriptions, pictures, maps and more! Save your favorite homes to view later. You can also text or email homes to your family and friends. If you have questions or want a tour of a home, press the “Contact” feature to call or email a ValleyMLS Real Estate representative who can assist you.
release_text: -Stability fixes -UI enhancements Thank you for your feedback!

description: Race fast! Be crazy! GoKart mania 3 is probably the wildest and most unconventional racer you will play this year. Enjoy cartoonish, wild graphics and race in your favorite go-kart. Different gaming modes will multiply your fun! Features: - Race in championship mode & visit locations all around the world or practice your skills in a single race - Select from a range of crazy go-karts and unlock even more - Unlock awards to prove your skills and master your career - Exclusive soundtrack!

What are you thinking about when you hear the rustle of paper? Documents, financial accounts, book-keeping…Or maybe, autumn leaf-fall with crispy golden leaves swirling and sparkling around slowly… Just picture another view to yourself: this paper is valuable :) and it is flying straight to your desk, covered all over with gold coins! Money? Lots of them!!! There is nothing so enticing as the freedom to have it. Set this live wallpaper to attract more money! Do you want money? Take it, they are flying into your hands! Аnd what about your friends? Do they know the value of your paper? Share with your friends! Try a lite version to estimate the quality of wallpaper! ♦ Currencies: - Dollars - Euros - Rubles - Yen - Juan - Pounds - Hryvnias - Dirchams(AED) - Rupees - Franks ♦ Backgrounds: gold coins, moonlit night, sunny day ♦ Few cameras ♦ Choosing speed and count of money ♦ Opportunity of choosing multiple currencies falling together ♦ Disappearing and deflating mode ♦ Deflating of laying currencies by shaking and gestures Additional information: ♦ Wallpaper supports phones and tablets (landscape and portrait orientation) ♦ Battery saving: - Consumption of resources is only if visible - Frames per second limit - Choosing of textures quality ♦ OpenGL ES 2.0 required
release_text: Update 3.0.1: ♦ Fixed black background on some of devices Update 3.0: ♦ Added background "clocks" ♦ Added YOUR OWN BACKGROUND selection from gallery ♦ Added Kazachstan tenge (KZT) Update 2.4: ♦ Added option "Banknotes value" - you can choose the cash flow speed! ♦ Added swiss franks (CHF) ♦ Money count increased (up to 400) ♦ Fixed some bugs

description: Next Train Ireland is a simple, slick app that will quickly show you train times for any station in Ireland. Incorporating a modern UI that follows the Material Design guidelines, the app has lots of great feature such as: - Comprehensive journey planner showing detailed itinerary information for any journey between two stations - Fast realtime station lookup with detailed train information to show you what stations a train will call at - Android Wear support - Travel news from Irish Rail on Twitter Please note this app is unofficial and not affiliated with or endorsed by Irish Rail.
release_text: 4.0.1 - Fix for trains appearing under wrong direction for some stations - Added option to show ETA in results - Train's last known location now shown in train detail screen - Added auto-scrolling to next arrival station on train detail screen - Now remembers which homepage screen you were last on when opening the app 4.0 Completely rewritten from scratch, the app has a new clean look that follows the Android Material Design guidelines and incorporates new functionality.

description: The cooles and addictive game Dots is now available with an new design and game fieling. Connect as many same-colored dots as you can in 60 seconds. Check out Endless Mode, and play as long as you want! "The best and coolest connecting dots game on Android."

Have fun! In this game you need to control the traffic light on the cross, to the cars do not hit. The kids will love controlling the traffic. Note that the emergency cars have time to cross the intersection, if they delay and time runs out, you lose the game. Each emergency car cross the intersection will give you 6 bonus points to be used to increase the time. (touch the emergency car to add time). If a car crashes at the intersection or the time of an emergency vehicle runs out, you lose the game. The game has two modes: Challenge, in this way we must complete a level to open another. Survival, this mode is open at the feed rate of the levels. In this mode you play to pass the most cars through the intersection.
release_text: **** Now also available for iPhone and Windows Phone. **** * Minor bugs fixed.

description: Udhayam Complex - Now check movie listings, movie show time and book tickets from your android mobile. It’s Simple, easy and secure to book tickets for your favorite movie in Udhayam complex using your Android Mobile.

Salt, el traductor oficial de valenciano. Es un traductor que permite pasar los textos del castellano al valenciano y a la inversa, con un método interactivo que minimiza los errores y garantiza una gran calidad de los textos traducidos. El Salt es un programa de autoaprendizaje que permite también aprender valenciano a partir de sus propios errores, con cientos de fichas de ayuda sobre léxico, cuestiones gramaticales, mayúsculas, signos de puntuación. Salt, the official translator of Valencia. It is a translator that allows passing the Valencian Castilian texts and vice versa, with an interactive approach that minimizes errors and ensures high quality of translated texts. Salt is a self-learning program also it allows Valencia to learn from their own mistakes, with hundreds of chips help on lexical, grammatical issues, capitalization, punctuation.

Cats! Frogs! Pigs! Dinos! and More! Plus 30 new levels! Plus all new World 7 with the dreaded Snail Boss! Like platform games? Like running games? Well, you're gonna luv Diversion: 255 levels, 8 Worlds, 700+ characters - one touch! - Challenging gameplay requires timing and puzzle solving - Cheat codes for in-game prizes: gem packs, characters, levels! - Daily Bonus! Earn gems and characters every day you play! - Boss battles! - 700+ fully-animated playable characters to unlock and collect - 255 Levels - 8 Unique 3D Worlds - 3rd person camera: see all the action - Different every time you play! - Any gem or token pack purchase removes all in-game ads… forever!!! - Google Play Games Leaderboards and Achievements - Bluetooth controller support - New ways to earn free save tokens - Tablet support ★★ Hover World Preview level!!! Cruise around on your hover board collecting gems, or jump off and run around in this free roaming world. Check out http://facebook.com/ezonecom for details! ★★ Be amazed at what you can do : run, jump, climb, hang, swim, zip, slide, and even fly! As you progress through levels you'll unlock more challenging gameplay and hazards, including: spikes, chasms, zip-lines, slides, ledges, holes, buttons, spiderbots, bouncer bombs, water, laser walls, meteors, security drones, aliens, mutant sharks, chompers, stompers, lava, steam vents, blast vents, reversers, stoppers, portals, spike rollers, and more! 175 challenging levels will require timing and puzzle solving skills to complete and unlock hundreds of playable characters including: Ninja, Alien, Rocket, Karate, Robo, 60s, Zombie, Burglar, Tiger, Egyptian and even the Freaky Chicken and Future Banana! Will this be your next Diversion? Note: Diversion is a graphically intensive game and a high powered device is recommended. If you are on an older device and notice some lag during play, try switching to the LOW graphics setting in the options menu. If you are enjoying Diversion, make sure you check out our other games: "Snow Spin": http://ezone.com/android/ss "Team Awesome": http://ezone.com/android/ta "Crazy Snowboard": http://ezone.com/android/cs UPGRADE TIP: We suggest you save your progress with the free 'cloud save' feature. That way if something goes wrong during the upgrade you can restore your game progress.
release_text: Hope everyone had a great holiday season!! Now it's back to business as usual.

description: "Who's There?" - is the educational and entertaining game, that improves versatility of its user. Application was introduced first time to their users in 06.05.2014 on Semester Project Presentation of 2nd year students of Suleyman Demirel University by Nurzhan Izdauov. Game consists of four playing modes. Blitz Mode - is the mode where user plays for limited amount of time. Marathon Mode - is the mode where user plays till the first incorrect answer. Battle Mode - is the mode where two users play with each other, which will be implemented later. Training Mode - is the mode where user just tries to learn without any limits of time, or possibility of loosing. Learning Mode - just to learn an information from wikipedia.org about our celebrities. I hope you will enjoy it!

app_name: 【販売完了】　ウィズダム英和辞典　第2版・和英辞典（三省堂）
description: ★★総合的英語発信力が身につく英和・和英辞典★★ ★★書籍の改訂版(英和第3版・和英第2版)が2012年11月に刊行されております。★★ 本製品はウィズダム英和辞典　第2版・和英辞典初版です。 ご確認のうえお買い求め願います。 ■特長 ●英和辞典 ・学習からビジネスまで幅広くカバーした約9万項目を収録。 ・約4万項目に音声付き。 ・三省堂コーパスの分析をさらに深化させて徹底的にブラッシュアップ。受験情報も反映。 　 ＊「三省堂コーパス」とは、三省堂が独自に開発・構築した日本人の英語学習に特化したコンピュータコーパス (大量に収集した実際の使用例であるテキストデータをコンピュータで解析可能なかたちにしたもの)です。 ・頻度順の語義配列。 ・基本重要語を徹底解説。 ・新機軸のコラム「コーパス頻度ランク」「読解のポイント」ほかを加え、学習をあらゆる角度からサポート。 ●和英 ・学習からビジネスまで幅広くカバーした約8万8千項目を収録。 ・国語辞典・日本語コーパスを分析し、いろいろな場面 に対応する充実の用例。 ・自然な英文を書くための詳細な語法・類語解説。 ・まとまった文章を書くときに役立つ情報を満載。 ■トリプル・ブラウザー搭載 スマートフォン３インチからタブレット１０インチまで「ユーザインタフェース」を３モード搭載しました。 使いやすい操作環境を選べます。 ■基本的な使い方 ・見出し語検索 画面右上から単語、文字を入力し「前方一致」 「完全一 致」「部分一致」「後方一致」で検索することができます。 ■複数のONESWINGアプリとの相互串刺し検索に対応しました。 ■ウィキペディア日本語（ネット辞書）との連携 無料で利用できるネット辞書のウィキペディア日本語版も一緒に一括検索の対象にすることが出来ます。 ■検索エンジン『ONESWING』について 本アプリは、高速で豊富な検索機能を搭載した富士通製『ONESWING』製品名はInspirium 辞書検索ライブラリ V1.0を採用しています。 ※詳細は富士通Inspiriumの紹介サイトへ http://edevice.fujitsu.com/jp/products/embedded/products/dic/index.html ■手書き入力の推薦 Androidマーケットで（7 Knowledge Corporation）社が提供している「これなら使える！」「誰でも使える！」手書き日本語入力「mazec (J) for Android」を推薦いたします。 従来の手書き入力とは違い連続入力が出来ます。 辞書が充実しているためスムーズ操作できます。 ※詳しくはAndroidマーケット>ツール>mazec　から。 ■サポート情報 本製品のご購入後のお問い合わせにつきましては「ONESWINGサポートセンター」にてお受け致します。 ※尚、辞書コンテンツの掲載情報については、出版社窓口へお問い合わせください。 ■ONESWINGサポートセンター 受付時間　　10:00～18:00　土日祝日を除く 電話: 0120-77-1970 ＊年末年始は誠に勝手ながら12月29日より1月3日まで休業させていただきます。 ■必要メモリサイズ インストール時：200MB程度 使用時： 2MB以上 ■メモリー管理 アプリ（検索エンジン+ブラウザー）は本体内アプリ領域にインストールされます。(約2MB）書籍・辞書データはmicroSDHCカード又は内蔵データ領域にインストールされます。(約200MB） 注)※microSDHCを交換する場合は「メニューボタン」から「コンテンツダウンロード」を選び書籍・辞書データの再度ダウンロードが必要になります。 ■コンテンツのダウンロード方法 description: ЖД билеты – первое приложение для покупки железнодорожных билетов. Заказывайте билет на поезд в своем смартфоне, оплачивайте заказ банковской картой, проходите электронную регистрацию прямо в мобильном приложении! Воспользовавшись электронной регистрацией, вы можете пройти на посадку, предъявив проводнику паспорт и распечатанный электронный ЖД билет. Контрольный купон, который входит в состав электронного билета, является отчетным документом для бухгалтерии в случае командировки. Билеты в мобильном приложении «ЖД Билеты» реализуются от лица компании ООО «УФС», официального агента ОАО «РЖД» по продаже электронных железнодорожных билетов. Ценообразование в мобильном приложении полностью совпадает с ценами на сайте www.ufs-online.ru. ООО «УФС» работает на рынке более 10 лет, и использует торговую марку РЖД в мобильном приложении на основании официального лицензионного договора. Приложение прошло тестирование в ОАО «Научно-Исследовательский институт Железнодорожного Транспорта» (ВНИИЖТ), и одобрено в качестве полноценного канала продажи электронных билетов на поезда отечественных железнодорожных перевозчиков. Train tickets - the first application for the purchase of railway tickets. Book a train ticket to your phone, pay for your order by credit card, go through the electronic registration directly in a mobile application! By using the online registration, you can go through the gate conductor presenting a passport and a printed electronic railway ticket. Control coupon, which is part of the e-ticket is reporting documents for accounting in the case of a business trip. Tickets for the mobile application "Train Tickets" are implemented on behalf of the company "UFS", the official agent of JSC "Russian Railways" selling electronic railway tickets. Pricing in a mobile application is identical to the prices on the site www.ufs-online.ru. Ltd. "UFS" on the market for over 10 years and uses the trademark Railways in a mobile application on the basis of an official license agreement. The application has been tested in the "Scientific-Research Institute of Railway Transport" (VNIIZhT), and is approved as a full-fledged sales channel for e-tickets for train domestic rail carriers.

The journey continues in a whole new way... Now you can keep inventory of your favorite Tim Holtz signature products from Ranger, idea-ology, Sizzix Alterations, Stampers Anonymous, Tonic, and Core'dinations with this interactive app right at your finger tips. Create a wish list of the products you want to explore, and watch Tim's technique videos right on your device. Keep up with Tim's many adventures with quick access to his events calendar, blog, facebook, and twitter.

This app requires that you have PlayOn Media Server running on your PC. You can get PlayOn for free at www.playon.tv. With PlayOn you can easily watch local videos from your PC on your Android phone or tablet. PlayOn will also aggregate all of your favorite streaming content from over 60 sites into one easy-to-use intuitive interface on your PC. Want to do even more with PlayOn? Upgrade to PlayOn Plus for as little as $4.99 and you can not only watch local videos on your mobile device, you can stream to your phone or tablet using the same intuitive interface. You can also record streaming video from virtually any streaming site, including Netflix, HBO Now, HBO Go, and Hulu. You can cast videos to your TV via your Xbox, Roku or Chromecast. We've got you PlayStation folks covered as well, use your PlayStation to watch any streaming video on your TV via the PlayOn server. You can do all of this from the device, from your PC, or using your Android device as a remote. Here is a list of just some of the supported channels you get with PlayOn: Netflix, Hulu (no Hulu Plus required),HBO Go, HBO Now, ABC, NBC, Fox, CBS, Comedy Central, PBS, MTV, HGTV, ESPN, ESPN3, TV.com, Cooking Channel, The Food Network, PBS Kids, Acorn, Vevo, Sprout and many more. New channels are being added continuously! Imagine catching up on your favorite TV series while waiting for a flight, or enjoying a sitcom commercial-free during an oil change. Wherever your daily life takes you, PlayOn can entertain you. Try it risk-free. Install this free app, then download the free PlayOn software to your PC. You’ll be up and running in 5 minutes. Enjoy!
release_text: All new interface. Added free features. Back-end improvements. Local media player.

description: Interior Design application is a simple,good and elegant collection of interior design images which can be handy to decorate your home with one of these designs,It includes design for bathroom,bedroom, kitchen,Living room along with option to mark selected images as favorites. Whether you need is simple, small space or house interior, modern design, room, house interior or decoration, we've got the photos that will help you find the inspiration you need! Formal or casual, everyone finally gathers in the living room or family room. The application will give you techniques to use to create a modern, luxury living room and living room lighting. Find information about bedroom and decoration, bedroom furniture, pink, luxury and modern bedrooms to help create a personal space in your bedroom. Features: 1)Large Collection of latest and modern Bedroom designs 2)Large Collection of latest and modern Bathroom designs 3)Large Collection of latest and modern Living room designs 4)Large Collection of latest and modern Kitchen designs 5)Mark selected Images as favorites and view them as per your choice. 6)Share application among your friends and family using facebook, google plus. If you like this application please give it a 5 star rating. This application is in continuous development and we will enhance and support this app on regular basis. If you find any issues please write to us @ freeandroapp@gmail.com Visit us @ www.freeandroapp.com Follow us on facebook : www.facebook.com/freeandroapps Follow us on Twitter @ freeandroapp

description: Forget the Milky Way! This is the Rabbids Way! Rabbids Big Bang is the first Rabbids physic-based game on mobile devices that lets you pilot a Rabbid in space with the tip of your finger! BECOME AN EXPERT RABBID PILOT WITH ONLY ONE FINGER! * Use a bat to thrust a Rabbid into space… * … and control its trajectory using the jetpack and planet gravity. * Play tactically as your fuel will drain when you boost. * Don’t crash into the planets... unless you’re asked to! COMPLETE 150 SILLY AND CHALLENGING MISSIONS * Explore 10 different wacky galaxies each of them offering 15 missions. * Bounce on Space Duckies, hit Space Cows, or fly your Rabbid to the Sun. * Use our ranking system to progress with your Rabbid and unlock achievements. UPGRADE & CUSTOMIZE YOUR RABBID * Collection coins to upgrade the jetpack and increase its power. * Customize your Rabbid with new helmets, bats and more for the funniest looks. * Equip your Rabbid with special items and master the galaxy of fun! THE RABBIDS WACKY HUMOR *Space cows, cheese planets, UFOs… Your Rabbid will have more than one occasion to scream Bwaaah…and so will you! Rabbids Big Bang is made for your children! It includes a parental gate that prevents accidental in-app purchases. This game can be downloaded over the air, no Wi-Fi needed to play! Game available in: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Brazilian Portuguese and Russian. Note that this application is not compatible with custom roms (ex: Cyanogen) Stay on top of your game! Get the latest news, deals, and more at.... FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/UbisoftMobileGames TWITTER: http://twitter.com/ubisoftmobile YOUTUBE: http://youtube.com/user/Ubisoft

In this game you have to test your imagination and creativity, specifically to color a princess who sits on the steps of a great castle. The design should be more colorful and appealing to signify the life of a rich princess. First you have to paint the castle and have available a variety of color palettes. You need to color outside the fence of the castle steps that lead up to the castle, the surrounding trees with leaves and branches it has to give it a touch of the hills and mountains surrounding the castle and not least she must give a beautiful shade of heaven, because it could be day or night, depending on the color you choice. After we finished painting the castle to the next level, specifically in painting beautiful princess that I chose to start the game. We need to color your dress in a beautiful shade because we all know that princesses have the most beautiful dresses. Then we will stain your hands and the gloves up, hair, and ultimately face. Must be a beautiful princess and perfect. Thank you for choosing this game and invite you to choose other games for girls in this category to test your imagination and creativity. Instructions: Use your fingers to play

2 Players, One Screen: Gentlemen! A Victorian era head-to-head arcade battle for 2 players sharing a single tablet! Requires a tablet, 7inch+ Take on your friends in this frantically paced duel game. Knives, bombs, homing pigeons - choose your weapon wisely, and master the art of the gravity flip. An honorable duel, a dapper delight - GENTLEMEN! **8/10 on Edge!** **4.5/5 on Touch Arcade!** **4.5/5 on 148 Apps!** **9/10 on PocketGamer!** You'll need to hone a delicate balance of technique, knowledge, cunning, and blind panic (just like a real duel!). You'll also need a friend - two players, one screen. If you don't have a friend, go and get one. Seriously, this is a game for tablets. Don't play it on your phone.
