Traffic Alert is a real-time personalized traffic reporting system with great highway and city-street coverage for Toronto commuters. With Traffic Alert, you're always aware of any traffic congestion well in advance with hands-free visual and audio feedback advising you of traffic conditions on your route. Traffic Alert has a NEW design with NEW features to help you manage your daily commute better. You can add your favorite destinations and get routes with less touches now. We have also enhanced the way point functionality so you can create a fully customizable route. Please send us feedback on how you like the NEW changes we've made. Features: * Hands free audio traffic report. No driver distraction. * Monitors traffic when you input a route and as you drive (5 miles ahead on local streets, 20 miles ahead on highways) * Save your most-used routes and receive daily traffic push notifications before you leave home or work * Push notifications of major traffic incidents that affect the entire metro area * Help other commuters! Report traffic tips to the traffic center and we'll use your report to update others Using collective data and reported incidents gathered from live users as well as other traffic sources, Traffic Alert guides you to your destination with informative, real-time updates. It’s like having a personal traffic helicopter watching your route for all the highway and city-streets you are going to travel on, every time you get into your car. Use the app to have better traffic information on your commute, and report traffic incidents to help out others behind you. Join the Traffic Alert movement today! It will change the way you drive.
release_text: What's New in Version 5.2.1 ===================== -Major and minor bug fixes -Performance enhancements -3D view if route is activate and center location toggle is ON -Push notification issue fixes Download and let us know your thoughts (Menu > Feedback)!

description: 「那麼久沒連絡！！你唯一傳來的訊息竟然是波兔村！」朋友怒了。(｀А´) 「一起玩　一起玩　一起玩。」您小聲說道。(￣ー￣) 如果您和我們一樣熱愛LINE遊戲，又苦於朋友不夠多無法玩的盡興，那麼歡迎下載我們開發的這款App，除了可以看到免費貼圖情報及各款遊戲新資訊之外，還能藉此尋找到和您玩相同遊戲的朋友喔。 本App使用方式非常簡單： (1)登入您玩的遊戲，等待其他玩家加您為好友 或者 (2)搜尋和您玩相同遊戲的玩家，送出交友申請 很快地，您就會擁有許多志同道合的朋友，互相送禮物，每天一起玩。(´▽｀) 除此之外，您還可以在這隻App中，看到熱門LINE遊戲情報與攻略，並可在各遊戲專屬討論板中和同樣喜愛遊戲的網友交流。 從此，您再也不需打擾到沒玩遊戲的好友，因為，您將擁有一群和您一樣喜愛遊戲的新好友，幫您解任務、在一起養魚、互送幸運草、送愛心…。立刻下載本App，無論哪款遊戲，都找得到朋友一起玩喔～ ＼(o)／ 可交友對象幾乎包含所有的LINE遊戲...等等共40多款遊戲。

Document Scanner is an smart document scanning solution for all individuals, small and medium businesses, corporate, NGOs, students and schools. Scan all kinda documents and receipts with your mobile phone camera, crop as per your need and convert them to PDF. It is a portable document scanner for your Android phone. Features: • Scan Document in just 3 seconds and save and email too in PDF format. • Scan and add pages later to an existing folder • Insert existing gallery image • Crop,Compression and page size options • Merge all your scanned documents into a single pdf • No page limit • Convert your Scanned document into PDF • Email your scanned document • Upload your scanned documents to Dropbox GET ALL YOUR IMPORTANT FILES ON YOUR MOBILE & EMAIL WITH OUR DOCUMENT SCANNER APP. description: - prologue – When I considering purchasing a new house, I went for a guided tour at a model house. Nowadays, houses are more high-tech with means for energy-saving and IT technology installed, thus turning into reality the urban landscapes that were once seen in imaginary images of the future. However, this change was not related to high-technologization alone. I wonder if this, too, is one of the forms of the new future lifestyle? Your mission is only to escape from the room by opening the door. However, to do this, you'll need to gather some items and use those items in solving puzzles. The rules are very simple. You can tap various locations, and you can also flick when you need to move about the room. Language:English,Chinese,Korean,Japanese [compatible devices] Xperia acro HD(IS12S) GALAXY S2(SC-02C) GALAXY S3(SC-06D) GALAXY NEXUS(SC-04D) GALAXY Note2(SC-02E) We cannot guarantee that the apps will work on any model for which proper functioning has not been confirmed.

Are you looking for a very cute diary to keep? Our Icon Diary is just for you! You can select diary's background image and add icons for each diary. You can save a lot of diaries in a day. Saved diaries will be displayed under the calendar as image so that you can easily manage your diaries. You can manage your daily plans by adding 2 marks on each date too! ＊＊The initial window is the calendar.＊＊ ＊From the left. 1.「Add」button: You can create a new diary. 2.「Today」button: Go back to the today's date. 3.「Left」& 「Right」button : Move the date right to left. 4.「List」button: Display saved diaries in the list. 1. First, press 「Add」button of the calendar. 2. Then move to the Canvas Window. ＊＊＊Buttons of the Canvas Window＊＊＊ Left Top:「Shrinking」button: You can shrink the icons. Left Bottom: 「Rotate Left」button: Rotate the icons to the left. Left Right Top:「Stamp」button: You can add icons from the list below when it is 「On」. Left Right Bottom:「Background」button: You can change the background image when it is 「On」. Right: 「Delete」button: You can delete icons. Drag the icon to the trash can. Right Top: 「Enlarging」button: You can enlarge the icons. Right Bottom: 「Rotate Right」button: Rotate the icons to the right. ＊From the left. 1. 「Text」button: Press this button to write the text. Keyboard will be displayed. 2. 「Email」button: You can send the memo by email. 3. 「Mobile Background」button: You can save the memo as the mobile background. 4. 「Move Icon」button: When you press this button, the icons will be danced up and down! ３. When you move to the Canvas Window, 「Stamp」button is 「On」. When it is 「On」, the list of icons will be displayed below. 4. Tap any icon you want to add on the canvas. 5. Drag and move the icons wherever you like. 6. Press 「Background」button to change the background image. 7. Select a background image from the list below. 8. Edit Icons by using 「Shrinking」「Enlarge」「Rotate Left」「Rotate Right」buttons. 9. After creating the diary, Press 「Menu」→ Select 「Tag」→ Enter the name of the tag. 10. Press 「Back」button of the mobile to go back to the calendar. The diary will be automatically saved by doing so. 11. You can confirm that the diary you have created is saved under the calendar as an image. 12. 「Star」mark will be displayed on the date when there is saved diary. ※Pay version:No ads display

description: It’s summer vacation! Are you going on holiday with your family? You can go by car, train, bus or by airplane! In this game you are the stewardess who need to clean the airplane before the next flight. First you can do the indoor of the private jet. It’s a real mess in this plane can you help the stewardess to clean it up? There are 3 levels in this clean game for girls. ✔the indoor of the jet ✔ the cockpit ✔ the outdoor of the plane The visitors and the pilots made a big mess of the airplane when they were flying to their vacation destiny and now you can clean up the rubbish. You begin with cleaning up the indoor of the airplane. Do the mess in the dustbin and place the good things back where they belong. You also need to vacuuming and to dust the room. When you are ready with the indoor you go further with the cockpit. Also the pilot made a mess of the cockpit of his plane and stewardess cleans it up. Help her with the vacuum cleaner, window washing and throw the rubbish away. The pilots will be very happy with a clean cockpit and shiny windows! The last thing you need to do is washing the outdoor of the plane. During the flight the plane has become dirty. Wash and polish the airplane and give it the color you like and you can also choose a nice design. Do you like games to clean up the house but want something different? This game is the right game for you! This kids cleaning game is a nice variation. Features of free airplane flight clean up: ❀ clean up game for girls, kids and toddlers ❀ easy to play ❀ with three levels ❀ summer holiday style Do your kids love cleaning games? Then they will like this game! Special for the summer holiday we designed this airplane flight clean up game. Airplane flight clean up is a game from Top Girl games and one of the best clean up game for kids and toddlers, we publish many different easy to play girl game apps. We hope you will enjoy our Airplane flight clean up and we hope you give us the love by liking our Facebook page or follow us on twitter. So we can keep you up to date on our girl games, dressup, spa salon and cleaning up games. ♥ Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/LadiesDressUp ♥ Twitter - https://twitter.com/ladiesdressup

Decorate your Christmas Tree in your mobile or tablet. Over 60 fantastic objects, 5 different trees and 4 backgrounds. Save your Christmas tree and share with your family and friends. Christmas Tree is a kid friendly game to improve creativity. This app is suitable for kids over 2 years. Delete elements dragging it to the bin or push the bin to reset the tree. Garlands move only if you select it in the bottom panel.

Parents can view their child’s scores as well as the time they’ve spent playing. This 8th Grade games app includes: •8th Grade Functions •8th Grade History •8th Grade Language Arts (speech, word usage, spelling, sentence structure, grammar, vocabulary) •8th Grade Math (geometry, statistics, exponents, roots, ratios, proportions, equations) •8th Grade Reading (writing composition, reading comprehension, cause / effect, story elements) •8th Grade Science •8th Grade Socials Studies •8th Grade Statistics •8th Grade Vocabulary Let’s Leap Ahead features the best-selling line of educational books sold in North America. Our 8th Grade games app and other educational apps have quickly become the most sought-after educational programs by parents and teachers nationwide!

description: ☺ Geography Quiz Game - Best educational game for kids and grown ups! ☺ If you're looking for an ideal geography game for preschoolers, adults or seniors, search no more! Download 'Geography Quiz Game' and test your geography knowledge right away! Get ready for geography exam or simply have fun with your children, this quiz app is perfect for all of you geographers and fans of geo quizzes! Answer the geography questions on world countries and their flags, rivers, mountains and other geographic features of our planet! ✈ 4 Different Game Modes-10 Questions, 25 Questions, 50 Questions and 5 Errors – Out! ✈ Choose the correct answer among A, B, C or D! ✈ Answer the questions quickly and avoid giving incorrect answers to get higher rankings! ✈ Answer the question worth more than 2000 points and get Scandalous Score Booster! ✈ 5 Errors – Endless Mode! – Your game lasts until you choose 5 incorrect answers! ✈ Log in with Facebook to share your score and achievements! Best geo game for children and adults on the market! Try out this fun and educative quiz trivia and see how well you know the facts about planet Earth! This interesting picture quiz is great for preschool kids because it can help them gain prior knowledge and it will be easier for them to be better in geography classes in school. Watch pictures and recognize flags, country borders and famous monuments! Guess the official language of every world country! Play 'Geography Quiz Game' with your family and friends and have the time of your life! Check your knowledge of geography trivia by answering simple questions! All you have to do is guess the name of the country it’s about! In addition to geo questions, you can also watch images of national flags or country borders and choose the correct answer! Best quiz on world geography ever! Specially for all the boys and girls, kids and adults who love puzzle games, brain teasers and other intelligence games! Check how well you know the world map, countries, major cities and other geographical features! Improve your geographical knowledge and learn new geo trivia with this fun quizz app for Android TM! Test how well you know world geography by identifying landmarks from all over the world! See how well you know the official languages used worldwide and impress your friends with your newly acquired knowledge! Take a geography map quiz and check your knowledge on US, Europe, global geography in general, and see how familiar you are with the world map! You think you know all the countries on Earth and their borders? You think you know all the capital cities in the world? Do you really think you know all the national flags, official languages and landmarks and monuments worldwide? Get this cool quiz app and have fun learning for hours! If you love to play quiz games and geography quizzes, you will love this app! You can sit back, relax and enjoy learning new things! It’s boring to learn from books or other educational aids, with this quiz game you will actually have fun learning! Geography games are great pastime and they are very useful! Download this free app and enjoy learning!

Dino Island is a totally new raising experience with smooth controls lovingly handcrafted for your Android phones and tablets. Welcome to Dino Island and experience the peaceful, simple life of raising your dinosaurs from babies to epic adults and breeding them to discover rare dinosaurs! No hunter is allowed in this game. Are you ready to start this exciting adventure in Dino Island now? Living dinosaurs are waiting for you! Game Features: - Hundreds of dinosaurs with 10 different properties: Fire, Ice, Rock, Air, Plant, Jewel, Machine, Deadly & Alien - Dozens of habitats where you can always go back to collect coins - Breed different dinosaurs to raise new hybrid dinosaurs - Grow magical delicious food for your dinosaurs - Beautify your islands and shores with 15 colorful decorations - Enjoy stunning hi-res artwork and sparkling animation - Visit friend's islands and trade gifts to help them to raise dinosaurs

app_name: 背單字-Android 手機學英語 中級單字篇 Free
description: 『 中級單字篇 Free (中級體驗版) 』，最方便實用的背單字App， 請更新至最新版本，約『2,600筆 中級單字、3600筆以上的例句』全部上架，不論是單字模式與測驗模式皆可離線使用！ 如果您安裝後沒有聲音，或是按下『播放』鈕後，單字快速往下跑，或是單字拼音時有奇怪的發音、發音不好聽，表示您的『TTS語音』未安裝、設定錯誤、或是目前使用的TTS無法完全支援您的手機，請更換不同版本的『TTS語音』。 由於部份TTS語音不支援『單字拼音』的發音，所以取消預設播放『單字拼音』功能，請使用者自行於app開啟。 www.learning.idv.tw 有詳細操作說明與TTS安裝方式，非常感謝您的使用與支持。 英文要學好，單字不可少，讓Android機器人陪你(妳)走到哪、背到哪。 用聽的背單字，反覆記憶最有效！打破背單字一定要看書的傳統方式。這種重覆式大腦記憶法能更有效的熟記單字，同時達到訓練聽力並更精準的了解單字的使用方式。 用聽的背單字，讓您善用「耳朵」的記憶力來學習單字！不論是在坐公車、搭捷運、走路、…，善用生活上的零碎時間，讓學習無所不在，照樣說一口道地英語！ 單字不是萬能，沒有單字是萬萬不能。Android手機學英語-單字篇，參考「財團法人語言訓練測驗中心公布的7000單字」，重新分類整理與編輯出適合國人考試、生活、出國旅遊、工作進修的核心單字，廣泛地適用於一般的初學者、國中生、高中生、大學生、社會人士，有系統的聯想式記憶法，有效幫助使用者快速累積單字量。背單字功力迅速倍增。 Android手機學英語軟體，總共分成三個正式版本與三個體驗版本：初級體驗版、中級體驗版、中高級體驗版、初級、中級、中高級。 目前開放『初級體驗版』、『中級體驗版』於Android Market 免費提供下載與試用，初級正式版、中級正式版供付費使用，其它版本將陸續上線。 Free版本與正式版差異：目前除了廣告之外完全相同。未來正式版會增加完整版的『真人語音』、『自建單字庫』功能。 以下是版本說明與下載連結： ◎初級正式版(約2,200字，4000筆以上的例句)：適用於全民英檢初級、國中小考試。 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=tw.idv.learning.VocabularyBasic ◎初級體驗版 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=tw.idv.learning.Vocabulary ◎中級正式版(約2,600字，3600筆以上的例句)：適用於全民英檢中級、高中考大學必考單字【基礎篇】。 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=tw.idv.learning.VocabularyIntermediate ◎中級體驗版 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=tw.idv.learning.VocabularyIntermediateFree ◎中高級(約3,200字)：適用於全民英檢中高級、高中考大學必考單字【進階篇】，會在初級與中級正式版下載破萬後推出。 Android手機學英語-單字篇-軟體內容： 1.完整收錄全民英檢必備單字與片語，每個單字均詳列 KK音標、DJ音標、多筆完整的實用例句與中文解釋，讓您能更輕鬆的理解單字詞義與用法。 您還在用沒有音標與單字例句的單字書嗎？不要做沒有效率的學習，快來試試 Android手機學英語-單字篇。 2.『用聽的背單字』，不只是唸單字與例句，Android機器人還會拼單字的字母給你(妳)聽喔。TTS語音清楚唸出每個單字的發音，讓您背單字，不用看畫面，只要用聽的，輕鬆記單字！ 自由設定『單字發音與拼音次數』、『單字例句播放次數』，以及『上一筆單字播放』、『下一筆單字播放』、『全篇單字播放』。藉由獨創的重複聽力背誦學習法，讓您輕鬆背記單字。 3.所有單字都經過系統化編排，字母依A~Z排序，方便查詢與背誦。 除了內建的單字庫，每個單字還可以直接上網查詢喔。 4.每個單字皆附一筆或一筆以上的實用例句，是同類產品中單字例句最多最詳盡的App，活學活用、輔助理解加強記憶。 一個單字常常具有數種不同的意思與用法。Android手機學英語-單字篇 藉由不同的例句、詞性與中文解釋，讓您不僅可以增加單字量、還可以了解單字不同的用法與意義，讓背單字更有效率。 5.『測驗模式』，系統化檢視您的學習成效，只有實戰才能真正的靈活運用，讓你的英文功力在考場與職場上完全展現！ 獨創的單字測驗模式，不只測驗中文解釋、英文單字拼音、還可以測驗聽力，學習成效立即呈現！ 目前提供的測驗模式：『中翻英』、『英翻中』、『拼字測驗』、『模擬試題』，歡迎您來挑戰！ 6.每筆單字可標記熟練度。 藉由是否顯示已背誦的單字的功能，驗證記憶成效並方便背誦，讓您輕鬆背英文單字。 7.完全適用國內各類英檢考試。 例如國中基測、推薦甄試、大學學測與指考、二技、四技、公職考試，以及托福(TOEFL iBT)、SAT、GRE、全民英檢初(GEPT)、多益(TOEIC)。快速提昇您的字彙能力，讓您變成字彙達人。 8.好用的播放與查詢介面。 App將每個單字皆標上編號，方便查找。同時使用『手指快播方式』或是『點選上一筆與下一筆的方式』，讓您隨時預習、複習單字。 9.已內建好完整的單字庫，不需要另行下載與安裝，真正可離線使用的背單字App，只要配合您的英文程度選擇適合的單字書。 在單字軟體上自建單字資料庫要花多久的時間！不要再做沒有效率的事，Android手機學英語-單字篇分三種資料庫，適合全民英檢初級、中級、中高級與各類考試。 建議您以下列順序學習： 1.藉由『中文解釋』與『單字例句』了解單字的字義。 如果資料庫上的範例不足，可以直接使用線上字典查詢(目前提供六個網站查詢，版權為各公司所有)。 2.練習單字發音。 參考『TTS語音』、『KK音標』與『DJ音標』唸出每個單字的正確發音。 3.語音設定，將單字不斷重覆播放，用聽的背單字。 請將『播放單字拼音』打鉤，並設定適合自已的『單字發音與拼音次數』、『單字例句播放次數』。 Android手機學英語 - 單字篇，是一套符合國人學習使用的手持裝置軟體，主要特色是可以在手機與平版電腦上，利用零碎時間學習，用最新式的聽力學習法背單字。 版本進度：由於台灣的Google Market付費平台暫時關閉，作者也停滯了一年沒有更新版本。2013年2月底，付費平台已開放，近期已在加速開發與更新App。 長期版本規劃：開發托福單字版本、商用英文單字版本。 常見問題回覆： 聽不到聲音、級別分類、機器人語音難聽、沒唸出中文、自行設定例句要發音與否、字體大小與音標。 1.按『播放』後，頁面一直跑，聽不到聲音。解決方式：安裝TTS (text to speech) TTS 設定， 可參考網址 http://www.learning.idv.tw/mobile/list.aspx?main=180 有少數低階手機使用者無法完整安裝TTS語音，請耐心等候作者完成真人語音功能，即可解決此問題，未來也不需要安裝TTS語音。 在 設定 -> 語音輸入與輸出裝置 -> 文字轉語音設定 -> 引擎 引擎可使用『Pico TTS』、『SVOX』或『eSpeak TTS』。 如果您的『安裝語音資料』為淡灰色，表示沒有安裝成功，請先點選『安裝語音資料』後，會連到Android Market的『SpeechSynthesis Data...』，再安裝此App，即可完成Pico TTS的安裝。 『eSpeak TTS』安裝連結 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.googlecode.eyesfree.espeak 『SVOX』安裝連結 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.svox.classic 2.機器人語音很難聽。在真人語音未完成前，可試試不同的TTS，也有不錯的效果。 3.沒有唸出中文。中文的發音與真人語音會一起製作，希望能趕在年底一起發佈。 4.自行設定例句要發音與否。本軟體可自行設定例句與單字拼音要發音與否，還可以設定例句與單字拼音的播放次數。 5.字體大小與音標的設定，本軟體可自行設定字體大小，是否顯示單字範例、KK音標、DJ音標。 備註： 作者發佈軟體皆經過很多的測試，但身邊的測試設備不足，無法完整測試完所有設備與不同的Android版本，還請各位朋友能體諒，並在使用的過程協助回報問題與機器設備。 意見反應網址： http://www.learning.idv.tw/mobile/contactUs.aspx 操作上有任何問題、單字內容錯誤、系統錯誤、手機相容性問題、相關建議，都非常歡迎您來網站反應，非常感謝您的支持。 如果您覺得本軟體對您有幫助，請到Android市集撰寫評論，幫作者打打氣。
release_text: 2014/11/26.. V1.25 離線廣告導致當機修正 2013/11/28：V1.24 廣告導致當機修正 2013/09/12：新增完整範例的中文翻譯、同一字母可不分段、測驗的答案改成隨機出題 2013/05/26：數位學習網 『 桌機版網站』正式啟用 2013/04/24：V1.05 測驗模式的美工與當機修正 2013/04/14：V1.04 播放時文字變色 2013/04/02：修改www.learning.idv.tw 手機版網頁美工 (網頁版撰寫中) 2013/04/01：V1.03 增加TTS安裝說明、更新操作說明 2013/03/25：V1.02 『2,600筆 中級單字、3600筆以上的例句』全部上架、增加購物連結與資訊說明 2013/03/20：V1.01 Android手機學英語『中級體驗版』上架 未來陸續加入的功能： 單字範例的中文翻譯 (撰寫中) 測驗模式的題目可對調成隨機非固定式 (撰寫中) 測驗完成後增加統計報表 自建單字庫 測驗模式也加入語音 強化美編 真人語音 同義字、相反字

Guess the word with less pics and earn extra coins! • Play in 5 languages (English, French, Russian, German, Spanish): great tool if you're learning a foreign language Simple and highly addictive game for the whole family! • 200 puzzles • Unique puzzles: from easy to really challenging • Earn coins by guessing the words and use the coins to help you solve most difficult puzzles Can you guess all words and unlock all levels?

Offline map available without internet connection. Features: - map of the city - satellite map - tourist map - metro map - location detection via GPS. After downloading the application, you need an internet connection to download map.

This is an app for beginners to learn and practice English words. It uses a British speaker. The teacher’s pronunciation is clear and correct. It is from an actual voice recording. There are also some harder words for intermediate language students. You can learn new nouns and verbs using a tried and tested method - flash cards. This app does not teach grammar, but helps you to increase your vocabulary. You can have fun while learning. It is like a game where you use your word skills to earn coins. It can be used by both adults and kids. Can you complete all 50 lessons? If so, you will be at the top of the honor board! The first lesson is completely free, but you win coins if you successfully complete the quiz. The quiz tests aural as well as spelling skills. You need coins to access later lessons. Earn coins for each correctly completed quiz. Earn a bonus if you come back tomorrow or engage with some advertisements. If you desire, you can purchase coins. You can earn coins by selecting the $0.00 option from the purchase screen. This English game can be a valuable adjunct to a course of study such as ESL, TESOL and TEFL by improving both vocabulary and pronunciation. Reward for getting 100% on the quiz: no advertisements unless you "high five"!

Emily and Patrick set sail for their long-awaited honeymoon in the all-new Delicious - Emily's Honeymoon Cruise, an exciting time management adventure where it's anything but smooth sailing. Welcome aboard! Follow the newlyweds as Patrick and Emily embark on their celebration cruise. Sailing off into the horizon of wedded bliss, Emily soon discovers she doesn't know how to relax and she certainly isn't used to having others take care of her. To make matters worse, when Patrick tells her he's excited to start a family as soon as possible, Emily's response is tepid - she's not sure she's ready for that just yet. Can they find a way to be happy? Find out today! From the makers of the smash-hit Coin Dozer, downloaded by over 10,000,000 players! COOKIE DOZER comes straight from your favorite arcade or fair park and onto your Android! The game you’ve spent countless hours playing, now in the palm of your hand! No change needed. Push delicious chocolate chip cookies and treats into your hands by dropping some from your jar into the machine. Watch out though! Try not to push them off the sides and back into the oven. Collect cupcakes, chocolates, pies and more for special bonuses or even more cookies! It’s ok if your cookies run out, more will be flying out of the oven and into your jar very soon Keep checking back to complete your collection of sweets! description: 4 Player Reactor is the original fast, clean and funny reaction game for two to four players on the same device. Challenge your friends (or enemies) to a multiplayer battle of reflexes, wits and knowledge! Great as a bar game, ice breaker or to decide who has to do the dishes. One of 28 (we continuously add more) exciting mini-games is displayed on screen, and if you think the answer is correct, hit your button faster than your opponents to get a point. But be careful - hit it at the wrong time, and you'll lose one. After a few seconds, the next multiplayer challenge starts - and you can make up for lost points or extend your lead against your adversary! ---- Benefits of 4 Player Reactor: ---- 28 (and growing) games with four difficulties each ranging from easy to insane -- that means over 100 combinations! A single-player training mode when you want to hone your skills for the next encounter, no advertisements whatsoever, and lots of extra settings for even more multiplayer fun! ---- Up to four players on the same device! ---- Nobody needs to wait, two, three or four players, one device, at the same time! Frantic multiplayer action is guaranteed for all ages! Some of the included mini-games require pure reaction, so the younger you are the better, while other mini-games require knowledge of countries in the world and puzzle-solving skills. Who can be the best in all of them? ---- Lots of dynamic Minigames! ---- There are 28 mini-games included, and they span all sorts of areas. For example: Who can find the sad face in a group of smiley faces? Does the shown capital city really belong to the country? Can the mouse navigate the maze to the cheese? Hit when the screen turns white! When is the changing labyrinth completed from corner to corner? Has the Countdown hit Zero? React when the Tic-Tac-Toe game is complete! And there's many more! ---- Old-School clean graphics ---- Sporting super-clean and slick graphics, 4 Player Reactor doesn't try to overwhelm or distract you with fancy effects or big explosions.This also means it runs on even the oldest and crankiest of Android devices! Everything in the game has been tested on all kinds of screens, and it runs beautifully on tablets! ---- Settings to suit everyone! ---- There's a no-brainer "Quick Game" mode that allows you to jump right into the action. But if you hate math, or you only want to play that mode with the smiley faces, or you want a really really long game, you can change everything in the advanced settings menu! And if you're trying to learn a different language, we've got you covered: The game has been translated into 25 mysterious languages such as German, French, Chinese, Persian, Finnish, and many many more. ---- Independent developer team! ----- I'm an independent game developer and made the game all by myself - which explains the basic graphics (I like to think of them as clean ;)). I hope you like my game, and I totally crave your feedback, just send me an email at robin@coolcherrytrees.com .
release_text: v1.99: * New languages: Basque, Indonesian, Hebrew * Bugfixes to game flow * Language fixes for German, Basque, Finnish, Italian, Korean, Russian * Layout improvements for tablets * New Mini-Game: Blue Dot Labyrinth, Find the Panda v1.94: * New mode: Fitting Ball * New language: Swedish * Fixes for Czech language * Fixes for Jelly Bean (Flags & Mouse Maze)

description: "Son! Thats one easy way to make Trap right there!!!" - Parapa da Trapper Make synth sounds, trap beats and throw in some snare rolls and fx at the touch of a finger; no musical knowledge is required. It’s perfect for Trap fans, producers, musicians and non-musicians alike. Features: ◆ Over 100 professional, studio quality samples. ◆ 61 drum loops, build ups, grooves, snare rolls, and risers. ◆ 28 drum kit sound and percussive fx ◆ 12 gunshots, lazers and siren fx. ◆ Load and save up to 3 different sound bank layouts. ◆ Colour assigned buttons, for clear and straightforward use. ◆ Pitch resample all of the built in samples. ◆ 24 fully editable sample pads ◆ 1 octave keyboard (13 keys) with pitch shifting spanning 5 octaves. ◆ 3 different synthesizers ◆ ADSR and synthesizer volume adjustment. ◆ Sample Pads Select a sample for each pad and customise its volume, pitch, and loop duration. Layer up to 24 looping or touch triggered pads at once. ◆ Synth Choose from 3 different synthesizer types. Select the central octave with the octave + or – buttons, and pitch shift up to three notes at once in real time with the pitch shift wheel. ◆ADSR Use the rotating potometers to alter the attack, decay, release and sustain of your synth to get the perfect sound to fit your creation. ◆◆ Community◆◆ For the latest updates and to connect to the F.T.M. community: - Search and like Fresh Touch Media on Facebook - Follow @freshtouchapps on Twitter Tutorial videos and more music apps: http://www.freshtouchmedia.com Check out our other electronic music apps: Bass Drop Dubstep https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.freshtouchmedia.bassdrop Bass Drop Drum and Bass https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.freshtouchmedia.bddrumandbass

This app is designed for players of pen and paper RPG games who like the 1st edition old-school rules better than the new ones! Great for players who love the magic-oriented classes but find it a pain to constantly flip through spell listings to find the spell they want to use. All the spells are here for Magic Users, Clerics, Druids, and Illusionists, in an easy to use reference. This is not a self contained game and requires the 1st edition rule books to play. Designed to be usable with 1st Edition AD&D, Osric, Labyrinth Lord, Dungeons Dark & Deep and other similar "Old School" systems with minimal modification. All spells are also added to a database so that spell names are searchable in a snap! Now including a completely customizable spellbook that knows how many spells a day you get, allows you to pick from just the spells you have in your personal book, and remembers what you have cast! Originally designed with tablets in mind but we find it completely usable on a phone - particularly with that search function!
release_text: (1.55) Update Android SDK, minor text corrections. (1.54) Fixed crash on some 4.4.4 devices. (1.51) Fixed crash on some older devices. (1.5) Fix a link error, minor performance improvements.

In Gumball Mania you match 3 of the same flavor of candy gumballs as they drop through the gumball candy machine in order to earn points and pass levels. But watch out for the falling rocks, debris, and sticky balls from the gumball factory mistakes! As levels progress you can match 3 mystery gumballs to earn items to help with the debris. The gumball candy machine starts out slowly and then speeds up as time goes on. Play on easy, medium, or hard levels of difficulty and try out the Chaos Mode where the gumball factory is in chaos and anything could happen! A fun user experience is very important to us so before leaving a low rating please email us your complaint at seraphicmedia@gmail.com so we can try to resolve any issues and you can enjoy the game as much as possible! :)

description: Gradebook - ects for the student or the student. The student has the option to add the course, the final grade and the number of ECTS credits. In case of errors, suggest new features or any omissions, please contact us at kontakt@students.com.pl

Blooby is the cutest seahorse you have ever seen! Blooby's friends Splashy Fish and Flashy Sharky went to a hidden place and now Blooby must find them. It's a real adventure swimming through the highly difficult obstacles but it is easy to manage by just simply one time tapping the screen, so that Blooby keeps swimming. Do you think that you can help Blooby find his friends? Nobody knows how far they went, but maybe you will be the first who will find them. Start now with Blooby the adventure of an amazing undersea world and enjoy this awesome game! Compare your Highscore with your friends in the included Game Center! If you like this game or if you have found Blooby's friends, please rate and comment Blooby in the Play Store, so that everybody knows where they are.

With this extension you can display your favourite RSS (and ATOM) feeds directly on your SmartWatch 2. Add up to 4 different feeds and refresh them automatically. The content will always be completely displayed on the watch, so you don't need to your mobile to read the post. RSS Watch will show you all information of the post on the SmartWatch itself. If you enable the automatic refresh, you will be notified about new posts from your feeds. Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2
release_text: - ATOM feeds can now be displayed - Removed HTML from content of RSS feeds - Title of the blog will be displayed in the overview - minor bugfixes and stability improvements

description: Game warplanes two game modes, classic mode and battle . In battle mode your fighter plane faced against different enemies , each enemy has a different pattern of combat. In classic mode you must complete missions while dodging bombs, stones, rocks, remove helicopters and more. In this game you have to go beyond levels while you eliminate the enemies and dodge obstacles to reach the end of each level . There are different types and different difficulty levels . Each fighter has their own abilities , there are up to 5 different skills. The 5 skills are : - Detonate bombs visible level . - Shot of missile. - Double Shot of missile. - Create the energy shield to protect you from enemy missiles , helicopters , planes, etc ... - Resize your war plane to pass through smaller places. - Invisibility with which you can avoid enemy missiles , helicopters , airplanes, etc. .. To get these skills must collect boxes within each skill level . In addition there are permanent , automatic and manual skills. The manual skills will use whenever it's convenient , automatic skills activate automatically when you pick up a box and permanent is recharged throughout the level and can be used indefinitely. Game warplanes in which you'll have to juggle your war plane pressing on the right half of the screen and use skills by pressing the left half of the screen of your phone or tablet device. If you like games of airplanes and aircraft fighting , do not hesitate , in this game you will find different types of aircraft , including: F4U Corsair , P -40 Warhawk , P -75 Eagle, F-14, FA- 22 Raptor, F- 15C Fighter, Eurofighter , and many more. Discover them yourself, earn coins to unlock these planes. Among the enemies you find static objects pumps, mobile pumps , stationary rocks, moving rocks , cobwebs to annul your movements, energy beams , helicopters, etc. .. With this game of war will spend pleasant moments enjoying flying and fighting with all kinds of fighter jets and war. You will participate in epic aerial combat . The mission is to get safely to the finish at the end of the level, to do , shoot missiles , create energy shields , dodge enemy missiles and much more . Its easy to control and 3D realistic aircraft will assure hours of fun for free. If you get complete all the missions you can consider yourself an expert aviator. Wargame combat aircraft has the following game features: - 192 levels . - 21 warplanes . - 7 skills . - 8 worlds . - 24 bosses. - 10 Languages: Spanish , English , French , German, Italian, Portuguese, Turkish , Russian, Malay and Japanese. ***************************************** Do not forget to rate and comment on the game on Google Play Store for improvement. description: Keep getting those nasty late payment fees? Download this mobile bill organizer into your Android smartphone now and get daily reminders to pay your bills on time every time! No more easy money for the banks! Simply key in your payment amount and due date and this bill tracker app will notify you in advance when your bill payment is coming due. With this handy mobile payment tracker with you at all times, now you don't have to worry about forgetting to pay your bills while you go about your busy schedule! How Bills Reminder works: -Enter your bill payment amount and the due date via an intuitive user interface. -By default, Bills Reminder will start to remind you of the payment 5 days before the due date. The number of days in advance can be customized for each bill but the default is set to 5 days. (You can change the default setting as well) -Bill Reminders will fire off reminder notifications every day at a preset time (default is 8:00am) until you have paid your bill. Your device LED will also flash a distinct orange color to indicate that a bill payment is coming due. -Unlike other bill tracking apps, Bills Reminders will always fire off when the bill payment is coming due, no matter whether you have opened the app or not or whether you have rebooted your device. -You can also setup recurring bill reminders. The repeating period is extremely flexible, you can set bill reminders to repeat every X days,weeks,months or year. (Eg. every 2 weeks, every 6 days, every 1 month etc.) -You can also capture or attach photos of bills, invoices, receipts alongside each bill reminder you created. This is helpful when it comes to actually making the payment. All the information is already stored in the app, so there is no need to go and find that paper bill statement. -Paid Bills/Invoices/receipts can be kept for future reference With all those late fees saved, this bill tracking app will pay for itself in no time! This app is brought to you by Handy Apps! Connect with us on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/HandyAppsInc

description: FORGOTTEN GOD by Francis Chan (unabridged) is presented by Oasis Audio. This standalone audiobook app combines a professional audio recording with supplemental features for download-once, grab-and-go anywhere enjoyment. Powerful. When is the last time someone used that word to describe you? It doesn’t make sense that Almighty God would have children characterized by fear and insecurity. He put His Spirit in us so we could be known for our power (Acts 1:8; 2 Tim. 1:7). Sadly, most believers and churches are known for talent or intellect rather than supernatural power. What’s worse is that we’re okay with it. Could it be that we’ve forgotten the One who distinguishes us from every religion and cult in the world? Through solid scriptural support and compelling narrative, breakthrough author Francis Chan returns us to the Holy Spirit as the Bible describes Him. He reminds us that we were not created and saved merely to survive our time on earth. Chan contends that we’ve ignored the Spirit and are reaping the disastrous results. It’s time for the beloved church of Jesus Christ to reverse the trend of neglect. Let’s pursue the Spirit-filled life of effectiveness. This was professionally recorded by the author and Oasis Audio. DURATION: About 4 hours of narration. "It is true that God may have called you to be exactly where you are. But, it is absolutely vital to grasp that he didn’t call you there so you could settle in and live your life in comfort and superficial peace." (Forgotten God)

The virtual zombiepocalypse is here! The Rolling Dead is unlike any augmented reality game you’ve ever played. In this exciting twist on the zombie craze, the world becomes a video game and you choose the surroundings. IMPORTANT: YOU NEED A SPHERO ROBOTIC BALL TO USE THIS APP. DON’T HAVE A SPHERO? ALSO, FOR THIS APP WE ARE USING SOME PRETTY HEAVY PROCESSING IN OUR OBJECT RECOGNITION ALGORITHMS AND BECAUSE OF THIS, WE HAVE INTENDED THIS APP ONLY BE USED ON THE MOST RECENT AND MOST POWERFUL ANDROID DEVICES. WE ARE WORKING TO LOWER THIS BAR. ****************************************************** FEATURES: ****************************************************** • Destroy endless hordes of creepy zombies using the power of augmented reality. • Look through the camera on your device, find Sphero, and see the mayhem unfold before your eyes. • Play anywhere and watch zombies spawn right out of the ground. • Gain zombie-destroying ammo simply by driving Sphero around. • Set zombies on fire as quickly as possible before being eaten. • Gain a fiery power-up that turns Sphero into a flaming ball for maximum zombie destroying potential.

- Android Game of the Year Award 2014 nominee from Pocket Gamer - The Best Mobile Game Award on Winter Night Conference - "The Game to Die for” from playboard.me Do you want to be a Hero? Do you want to save beautiful princesses and fight fearsome dragons? Do you love puzzles, adventures and RPG? Are you are tired of boring match-3? Then I need you! I need a HERO ! The terrible Dragon has struck again! The princess is, as always, imprisoned in the tower and you are the only Hero available to take on this quest. Complete epic quests and acquire amazing treasures in this engaging puzzle RPG! Battle with horrible and hilarious monsters in our clever take on the match-three combat and RPG genres! Unleash powerful magic spells on your enemies - summon floods, firestorms and even the legendary blazing sword to aid you in battles! Watch as the fantasy story unfolds and become renowned throughout the land! Will you help villagers in need? Will you fight bandits or reason with them? Time to find out! Even more adventures await you! Join the royal tournament to compete with your friends and challenge the world. Advance through the leagues and become the ultimate tournament champion to win awesome prizes worthy of a real Hero! Still not enough danger? Then fight terrible monsters from beyond the Dark Portal. Each with unique skills, they are ready to dine on even the toughest of heroes! Prove your legendary might and smite them down! But worry not, as you travel the land in search of the princess, your loyal page and his trusty donkey will help you become the greatest Hero of all! They will stop it nothing to gather and mine the tools the Hero requires. developer: GiggleUp Kids Apps And Educational Games
description: Puzzle games are an early learning favorite for educators and children alike! By matching the shapes to complete the picture, kids will have a ball while developing important skills such as problem solving and shape, pattern and color recognition. This game is intuitive and fun, with beautifully illustrated graphics, voice narration and more! More than a shape puzzle game, Awesome Shape Puzzle 123 is also a picture dictionary featuring more than 150 sight words. Choose from 12 different categories of everyday words, as well as numbers and letters. When a puzzle is completed, the word is read aloud and spelled out. This is a great, gentle way to reinforce previously learnt words for preschool aged children, or to introduce reading to the younger kids. Accompanied by a friendly voice-over, children are encouraged to match the shapes to complete the puzzle at their own pace. Different playing modes allow the youngest mind to creatively play and explore with shapes and colors, while older kids are given more challenging puzzles to master. This is a versatile educational app that is suitable for children with special needs. KEY FEATURES - Kid-friendly interface with no complicated menus - More than 150 pictures and sight words for children to learn - 12 puzzle categories: shapes, numbers, dinosaurs, fruits, vegetables, toys, vehicles, ocean creatures, musical instruments, farm animals, playground equipment, and the alphabet - Clear and pleasant voice guide spoken by native speakers - Available in 15 languages: English, French, Spanish, Japanese, German, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Russian, Dutch, Portuguese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese and Italian. - Adjustable game modes to suit different age groups for kids - Multiple difficulty levels to train your puzzle skills - Pleasant music track that can be easily switched on or off - Parental lock for safe playing Awesome Shape Puzzles 123 is the latest all new educational app to join the much-loved Jigsaw Puzzles 123 which has been among the best-selling kids games all over the world. -------------- Connect with us! Visit us: http://www.GiggleUp.com Like us: facebook.com/GiggleUpApps Follow us: twitter.com/GiggleUpApps Email us: Support@GiggleUp.com Brought to you by GiggleUp, creators of the award-winning Interactive Telling Time and other educational apps and games for kids. Our goal is to promote learning through play with the purpose of helping children develop useful learning skills. Our apps are enjoyed by children, at home or in the classroom, all around the world!

description: Compete with the world realtime by playing this challenging massively multiplayer online word game! Given 4x4 board of letters, the object is to find as many words as you can in limited time by moving your finger over the letters. At the end of each round, your rank against other players is shown. Features: ★ Challenging game play with realtime leaderboard ranking and online competition ★ Game play similar to Boggle (TM) - 4x4 letter grid to find words from. ★ See meaning of words using online dictionary after your game finishes ★ See number of words remained during game play ★ Rotate letters for a fresh viewpoint ★ Scoreboards for different time-scales. Your ranking is shown in Leaderboards today, this week, this month and all time. ★ Detailed profile info. See your rankings directly in your profile. ★ Between 100 and 200 words on every game ★ Learn new words by seeing meanings in the dictionary, improve your brain ★ Multiple account support, every family member can have a different profile ★ Multi language support: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish and Turkish ★ Compatible with almost all android mobile phones and tablets and the most important part: Worgle is totally free! Thanks "edA-qa mort-ora-y" for giving permission for the "Worgle" name. Worgle is formerly known as Word Ruggle.
release_text: - Multiple account support - Multiple language support (german, french, italian, spanish, turkish) - many bugfixes & screens polished

description: Should you experience issues or need assistance, please send a support request from app settings, help and support. The most complete tool to monitor your battery: Shows historical data (%, mA, mW, mV and temperature), calculates estimated run-times and battery aging, helps calibrate battery, and improves your battery run-time. ► Use in-app purchase to remove ads or enable automatic history markers. ► Display all information using great looking graphics, fully scrollable and zoomable. ► Use additional packages to show great looking icons in notification bar ► Display historical graphics or battery data on your home screen using widgets of various sizes! ► Triggers alarm based on any battery data ► Manually resets battery statistics on rooted phone ► Calculate remaining time while unplugged or charging (AC/USB/Wireless) ► Calculate actual battery capacity ► Support multiple batteries ► Online help accessible from app ► Export data to System Tuner Pro to analyze which process is responsible for battery drain! ► Special support for Asus Transformer, Padfone, Inno D6000 and HP dual battery devices. ► Special edge support for Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge, Note Edge and S6 Edge+ ► Pro version has all features unlocked and no ads ◊ Wide (2x1) and graphic (2x1, 3x1, 4x1) widgets ◊ Export data to System Tuner Pro ◊ Update battery capacity or reference based on measured data ◊ Keep information of unlimited number of batteries (2 in free) ◊ Add history markers manually or automatically on boot, ROM/kernel/battery changes ◊ Lowest battery consumption on the market: https://plus.google.com/b/106924681632471871369/photos/102304021208890908384/albums/5989574773236760065?sqi=114366623839082572768&sqsi=65194c1a-d82a-4ba6-b2a6-4207a7dcba36

description: האפליקציה של פיצה האט מאפשרת לכם להזמין מכל מקום במהירות וביעילות את הפיצה הטובה בעולם. כולכם מוזמנים להוריד את האפליקציה בחינם, לבחור את סוג הבצק, גודל הפיצה והתוספות שאתם אוהבים והכול בצורה פשוטה ויעילה. בנוסף אפשר להוסיף להזמנה את כל מוצרים הנלווים לארוחה: פסטות, לחמי השום הטעימים שלנו, הסלטים הטריים, השתייה והקינוחים. באפליקציה ניתן לעקוב בזמן אמת אחר תהליך הכנת הפיצה משלב הגעת ההזמנה לסניף ועד הגעת השליח לפתח ביתכם. מהיום פשוט, קל ונוח להזמין פיצה האט דרך הנייד. בתאבון. נשמח לקבל שאלות או הערות בנוגע לאפליקציה android@pizzahut.co.il Pizza Hut's app allows you to order from anywhere quickly and efficiently the best pizza in the world. All are invited to download the free app, choose the type of dough, pizza size and extras you love and everything in a simple and efficient way. In addition you can add to order all related products meal: pasta, delicious garlic bread, our fresh salads, drinks and desserts. Application can be tracked in real time process of preparing pizza branch invitation arrived from New Envoy to develop your own home. Now simple, easy and convenient to order Pizza Hut through the laptop. Enjoy your meal. We welcome any questions or comments regarding the application android@pizzahut.co.il

Get alerts about disasters around the world. Select an event to see its location, damage, severity, and rumble radius on a world map. Tap once on an event for detailed view and links to sharing on social networks. 'Felt' and 'damage' distances are approximations only. Data is collected from a wide variety of sources including the US Geological Survey, NOAA, and many other sources from around the globe. Real Time Warning Pro has added PUSH notification features to help update users as fast as possible while maintaining optimal use of their gps, data and overall usage of their devices. Real Time Warning Free version: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.horizon.android.rtw&feature=more_from_developer#?t=W251bGwsMSwyLDEwMiwiY29tLmhvcml6b24uYW5kcm9pZC5ydHciXQ.. View earthquakes, cyclones, volcanic eruptions, hurricanes, floods and other natural disasters on an interactive map. Features include: +Real time warnings of natural disasters +Set custom disaster alarms +Set monitors for earthquakes, Cyclones, Volcanic Eruptions, Hurricanes, Floods +Share option with FaceBook and Twitter Connect +GPS

Displays officially licenced UKHO tidal data on an annual basis without ever needing to go online. **** Existing users: You must be running version 3.0 or newer to continue to be able to access our data!! **** The tidal data is contained in our annual data plugins and must be purchased using in-app purchases. Therefore this app should not be considered a free app. Once you have purchased the data, this app will allow you to view UKHO standard port tides up to a year in advance. The app will also calculate secondary port tides using either your offset data or its own built in offsets. (The 'UK data 2015' IAP contains data for 36 primary ports and over 500 secondary ports, see our website for more details on coverage) The main view is an 'At a glance' table view of each month's tides and tidal ranges. Selecting an entry will display an easy to use daily chart view showing the tide height for any time of day and a tidal stream view showing tidal direction and speed at hourly intervals. The 'At a glance' info for today can also be displayed on your homescreen using our widget. Downloads and displays the current Met Office Inshore Forecast. Absolute Tides also makes anchoring easy by calculating the maximum and minimum tides beween the current time and any selected future date/time. Note: This application will NOT work without at least one of our tidal data in-app purchases being installed. Please check that the tide data you want is available before downloading this app. The small print: For leisure use only. Heights of tides can vary from those predicted depending on the prevailing weather conditions. All data is given in good faith and is believed to be correct but we accept no responsibility for any consequential loss or damage arising from use of this application. Secondary port data calculated using offsets will be less accurate than the UKHO standard port data. This app is neither affiliated to nor endorsed by the Met Office.
release_text: v3.0 Tide data packs are now dowloaded using In-App purchasing. 2016 data is now available. v3.1.3 Fix bugs in secondary port creation and 'Highest tide before..' value.

description: Color Magic is an Android app which makes it easy to browse the thousands of great palettes, patterns, and colours from colourlovers.com. You can set any of them as your wallpaper, save them for later, or search by keywords. That's it - enjoy!

description: This app provides endless letter practice worksheets for kids who are learning their ABCs. Instead of spending a fortune in practice workbooks for $0.99 your kids or grandkids can practice their letter until they are seasoned writers. INCLUDES • Models tracing letters with arrows to help kids learn the proper order of the strokes. • Tracers for uppercase and lowercase letters as well as numbers. • Save practice letters to the Notebook • Share their writing with family, friends or teachers. The drawing engine is the same one as our award winning Color & Draw for kids. They can choose from many colors, add stickers, change the stroke size. There are undos and multiple erasers too.

DashClock Battery Widget is an extension for Roman Nuriks DashClock Widget. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.nurik.roman.dashclock You want to know how much percent of the battery are left or which power type is used to load your device? Then DashClock Battery Widget is the extension you need. Also the temperature and voltage of your battery is accessible in an easy way.

description: It's a fast and easy way to read Slovakia (Slovensko) News (Správy) in Slovak (slovenský jazyk) on Android. Slovensko Správy gives you easy access to read the most popular news sources from Slovakia (Slovensko) on your Android device. Take this app with you and stay informed with access to the latest news. FEATURES: √ News by site. √ News by category. √ Download news briefs automatically. √ Offline reading. √ News widget. √ Convert webpage to mobile format. √ Remove or sort news sources. √ Edit default news sources √ Subscribe more news sources via RSS √ Import more news sources via OPML √ Option to block images (reduce bandwidth). √ Share news via SMS, Email, Facebook, Twitter... *NOTE*: If the application crashes after upgrading, please uninstall and reinstall it.
release_text: - Update news sources automatically - Fix image size

description: Learn to read, write and speak Swedish. Practice your Swedish whenever you have a minute, e.g. while you wait in line. Learn a new language on the go! Absolutely FREE. ★ The most important Swedish vocabulary words with pictures ★ Repetition algorithm adapts to your language learning speed ★ Hear correct Swedish pronunciation (powered by iSpeech) ★ Practice your own pronunciation, using voice recognition technology ★ Instagram mode: pulls relevant pictures from Instagram for a more challenging and interesting learning experience Three difficulty levels for maximum word retention: 1. Swedish word is shown, choose the correct picture 2. Picture is shown, choose the correct Swedish word 3. Picture and English word is shown, speak or type the correct Swedish word Exercises will progressively get more difficult as you learn more words. WordPic is suited for beginners and intermediate learners, and is a great supplement to traditional language learning programs and to build up your vocabulary. The app works offline, no Internet connection is required (except for the word pronunciation and voice recognition features, and the Instagram mode). This free app does not require any unlocks to access all content. It displays both banner ads and interstitial ads. Users can remove all ads through an in-app purchase. This purchase applies to all devices linked to the purchaser's Google account. *This product uses the Instagram API but is not endorsed or certified by Instagram.
release_text: Version 1.4.1: ★ New Option: Adjust pronunciation speed (slow/normal/fast; activate in settings) ★ New Option: Pronounce every word automatically (activate in settings) Version 1.4.0: ★ Improved some pictures ★ Changed "Pronounce" button icon

description: Want funny? Love comics? We've got your fix. The GoComics app, from Universal Uclick, is the mobile comics portal for many of the most popular comic strips worldwide. From iconic favorites like Calvin and Hobbes, Peanuts, Garfield, Doonesbury, Dilbert and Marmaduke to modern favorites like FoxTrot, The Boondocks, Big Nate, Pearls Before Swine and Get Fuzzy, we offer the most diverse set of comic strips and panels in one single app for FREE. The content within this GoComics mobile application updates daily, bringing you the latest work from critically acclaimed creators, Pulitzer Prize-winning political cartoonists and the hottest up-and-coming talents. Within the app, you have the ability to: - Bookmark your favorite comics. - Share comics via social media, e-mail and text/SMS (charges may apply). - Access over 20 years of back issues of comic strips. Read the first-ever Calvin and Hobbes strips! Rediscover Charlie Brown and the Little Red-Headed Girl! Share FoxTrot with a younger generation! See Huey and Riley before The Boondocks became a cult classic! - Leer en español. GoComics tiene más de 30 cómics que están disponibles para nuestros Españoles fans de habla. - Read our liberal, moderate and conservative editorial/political cartoonists represent that all sides. Collectively, they have won more than 20 Pulitzer Prizes for editorial cartooning. - Gain insight into the comics industry with our blog that's updated multiple times a week. - Check out burgeoning cartoonists before they break out in our Comics Sherpa section. Upgrade to an ad-free experience by going Pro at http://www.gocomics.com/help/pro
release_text: Fixed swipe navigation bug. Updated search.

description: This free drink recipe app will lift your spirits and get you in the mood for great holiday party hosting. There are amazing recipes, including eggnog recipes, punch recipes, cider recipes, to add to all of your holiday favorites. Many drink recipes and creative ideas have been brought together all in one convenient place. This app has been expertly designed to be easily understood. Its step by step instructions will make the preparation and mixing of holiday drinks a snap. Packed with features and graphics, Drink Recipes will delight and please the drink mixing hosts as much as the guests. Drink Recipes App Features: * Free app * Easy to understand * Step by step instructions * Many great Christmas recipes * Professionally designed and created * Creative and inspiring holiday drink recipes Impress your friends, family, and co-workers with these great drink recipes at your next family or company holiday get together. With amazing drinks like Holiday Mimosas, Spiced Cranberry Cider, and Candy Cane Cocoa you can’t go wrong. There any many other delicious and pleasing recipes to use! This professionally created for adding that extra zing to your holiday festivities. Try the Warm and Spicy Autumn Punch or the Holiday Punch. Both are great party drinks that serve a few or many guests. No matter what your taste in Holiday Drink Recipe is, there is something for everyone! There are even great drink ideas to enjoy no matter what time of year it is. Download today to get the best feast and holiday drink recipes that the internet has to offer.

MtG Tracker is an easy-to-use and complete toolbox for Magic the Gathering ® players The free version of the best MtG app is back! We have removed -as requested- all copyrighted material from WotC, which includes the mana symbols, the tap icon and the app icon. From life counter with stats recording to deck building with in-app search and much more. Great on a phone, awesome in tablets! This is a free version, the following features can be unlocked via in-app purchases: * Advanced search * Deck Playtest * Unlimited number of decks (default limit is 5 decks) * Unlimited card lists * Ad removal Join MTG tracker on Facebook to get the latest news about the app and suggest new features ( http://www.facebook.com/magictgtracker ) * Life counter including poison and history tracker. * Multiplayer life counter * EDH (Commander) & 2HG (Two Headed Giant) special modes for the life counter. * Deck Manager and analyzer: Mana distribution and converted mana cost stats * Card search * Trade: Check prices of the cards you get and the ones you give. Fo not get spoiled again/ * Player profiles / Decks per player * Random Card search (great for Momir Basic) * Card pricing (prices courtesy of TCGplayer.com and CardShark.com) * Stats recording per player, deck and opponent deck (multiplayer stats are not recorded) * Deck importer (Apprentice and MWS formats) * Mana tracker (click on the pentagon at the right of players name) * Wishlist / Collection * Tournament mode * Coin/dice MtG Tracker Free does not know about the complex rules of the game Magic The Gathering ®. It is just a helper tool. Card images are retrieved from WotC servers. Magic The Gathering ® (mtg) is a registered trademark of Wizards of the Coast. This application is not affiliated to Wizards of the Coast or Magic The Gathering ® in any way.
release_text: * Fixed some card details from decks being wrong * Added Oath of the Gatewatch * Added colorless mana symbol * Updated oracle reference * Updated Banned and Restricted * Fixed missing cards on Magic Origins * Fixed Zendicar Expedition(s) typo * Minor UI Tweaks

description: Teacher Review "As Science teacher, I find many obstacles in finding the perfect medium in which to share information with my students. This often includes hours of google searches, you tube searches, etc. This app is amazing! It takes those hours I used to spend and turns them into seconds with one touch of this app. I love it! Thanks again for creating such an awesome app that gives me hours of my life back! " In the information age of today education, learning and teaching is changing fast. The technology that is being used in and outside of the classroom is everywhere. Almost every student has a cell phone with access to the Internet. Even with out Internet access there are educational applications for iPhone, iPad and so on. The methods for teaching students and special needs students are expanding. Some schools are going all iPad. Meaning all students will have iPads with digital textbooks and new learning tools. For students these types of applications can be very useful. The student who cannot focus on one type of learning at a time can flip back and fourth through the app to stay focused. The student who is an extremely visual learner will be attracted to the devices colorful screen of pictures in the lesson. The student who has trouble writing notes or preparing them self for a test can simply open up previous lessons and practice on the interactive quizzes of the apps. The student who is a auditory learner can listen to nature sounds while reviewing topics or watch videos related to each topic. The very high performing student can find interesting topic related daily news and summarize it for the class. All of these options can be utilized through one educational app. HS Chemistry Buddy is the ultimate tool for learning Chemistry. This app was designed by a teacher who has used all possible multimedia resources in the classroom for teaching chemistry curriculum. HS Chemistry Buddy is not only an app for learning chemistry but also a app for teachers. The features of this app makes studying extremely convenient. The features of this app include everything you need to prepare for chemistry exams. 1.This app includes attractive lessons on all topics below. 2. Interactive Fun quizzes by topic 3.Daily Chemistry and science news updates. 4. Fun videos from youtube. 5. Flash cards by topic. 6. Note Taking Tools This app would be ideal for classrooms with iPads because it has the resources to prepare for a High School chemistry class or to present a lesson. All the buddy apps are available on the app store and have been helping teachers and students since their release.

Write an archmage's autobiography in this 80-year 130,000-word interactive fiction! Play good or evil, man or woman, as you bring peace to the kingdom or take over the world with your sorcery. Brew potions, raise the dead, summon mythical beasts, control men's minds, and blast away your enemies. "Life of a Wizard" is an epic interactive novel where you control the main character. In each chapter, your choices determine how the story proceeds. Will you find romance, get married, or have children? Will you become the arch-mage, grand bishop, nature-loving druid, hardened battle-mage or even an undead lich? The choice is yours!

Live wallpaper with watch for Android phone or tablet. Seconds, minutes, hours, day of week, day of month, month, moon phase, battery, free memory and free external storage space (SD card). The view changes automatically after a specified period of time from one minute to one day. 10 watch bodies and thousands of combinations of design. You can change size of the watch from 260 to 780 pixels, and put it in different places on the screen. Set your background image or select background color. Before installing, make sure that your device supports live wallpapers. There is advertisement in the application (it's not a virus!). If you hate ads then download the paid version.

Offline map of Munich U-Bahn and S-Bahn. No internet connection required! Absolutely free. NO ADS! Are you going to visit Munich? Do you need a guide for it's local train system? Navigate easily within Munich public transport system. This application provides you with official and actual public transit map from MVV. Application controls are intuitive and the map image is of a high quality. The public transit system in this Bavarian city is fast and efficient, like much of Germany. There is the U-Bahn, the Untergrund Bahn, or Underground Train; the S-Bahn, the Schnell Bahn, or Fast Train; All public transit in Munich is operated under the Muncher Verkehrs und Tarifverbund GmbH. People often refer to this company and all public transit as the MVV, which is pronounced emm-vau-vau in German. Requirements: • any phone or tablet with an Android OS version from 2.1 (Eclair) to 4.0.3 (ICS)

★★Please purchase Visual Anatomy 2 instead. Visual Anatomy will be much less updated and may for downloading only in the near future. OVERVIEW: Visual Anatomy is an interactive reference, and education tool. The full version contains more than 400 high-resolution images and more than 850 feature points which can be interactively selected. Each feature has its own label and short description. The app also has search function which can be used as searching the labels of all feature points. In additional, 6 quizzes with 150 multi-choice questions also are included. It also can be used as a anatomy guide. USES: This app’s primary use is as a learning tool but can also be used for any professional who needs the occasional reminder. Additionally, this app is ideal for physicians, educators or professionals, allowing them to visually show detailed areas to their patients or students - helping to educate or explain conditions, ailments and injuries. FEATURES: ★ No internet connection is required except for downloading Gray's anatomy images. ★ Tap and Zoom - Pinch zoom into and identify any region, bone or other feature by tapping on the screen. ★ Quiz mode - test yourself with an option to switch off the label of the feature point. ★ Quick Navigation - jump to a different system or organ by selecting the thumbnail. ★ Multi-choice quiz. ★ Great for learning anatomy and physiology ★ High-resolution images. ★ Free periodic updates. ★ Can be used as anatomy dictionary by searching anatomy term. CONTENTS: 1. 3D organ overview. 2. One of main sections - Muscles. It have more than 140 muscles including full description (ORIGIN, INSERTION, NERVE, ACTIONS) and cover all superficial muscles and most of deep muscles. 3D muscle overview. 3. One of main sections - Bones. It has all bones in the skeleton system including small bones in the neck region and has ligaments in knee and shoulder joints. 3D skeleton overview and 3D skull overview. 4. Respiratory System, Lung, 5. Digestive System, Liver, 6. Urinary System, 7. Nervous System, Brain, Central Nervous System, 8. Reproductive System (Male and female), 9. Senses (Finger, Hand, Ear ,Mouth, Nasal Cavity, Nose, Tongue,Human Denture) 10. Circulatory system. 11. Endocrine System 12. Surface Anatomy HOW TO USE: The user can zoom in to any area by using pinch zoom. The feature point (cross) can be selected by tapping on it. Detail button allows you to switch on/off the short description. For muscle section, detail button only show the description. Pressing the rotation button to allow you to change the view. Quiz mode button allows you to switch on/off the label and short description. SEARCH: When you input more than one characters, the search function automatically gives a list of potential key words. You can just select one of them from the list. The result will be the feature point on the anatomy image, label and short description. For LG optimus users ONLY !!!!!! 1.Please use menu button on your phone to activate the setting menu on your main acitivity windows(20 icons). 2. Set Color mode to Full Color That will fix image display problem. FEEDBACK: I'm open to suggestions so don't hesitate to send me an e-mail if you find something is missing.
release_text: v2.3-2.9 Add muscle highlighting tool and full description (ORIGIN, INSERTION, NERVE, ACTIONS). v4.0 Major update. Improve bone section. Add 10 more muscles. Redesign landscape view for tablet and big screen phone. Add French Language support. v4.1 Add Spanish, German language support. Improve graphics and improve bone section. Add surface anatomy. Improve Gray's images download.

description: Now your preschooler can learn and play on an adventure with Dora while exploring her great, big world! With kid-tested games focused on literacy, math, and science, your kids will have hours of learning and entertainment at their fingertips! Every day Dora will take your kids on a learning adventure with interactive stickers and Explorer Badges as rewards along their way! Fill up Backpack to go from a Junior to a Super Explorer! Play learning games designed to foster school-readiness skills like: •The Bugga Bugga Rainforest Water Show: letter recognition (including uppercase and lowercase letters) and exposure to letter sounds •Benny’s Barn: word families (such as the “AT” word family – sat, hat and mat) and early reading skills •Isa’s Flowery Garden: basic math concepts, including numbers and counting •Purple Planet Space Friends: critical thinking and problem-solving skills •Tico’s Nutty Forest: Logical reasoning and process skills (observing and experimenting) Each game teaches fundamental concepts critical for preschoolers. Games are leveled and designed to increase in difficulty. Appropriate hints are provided to support children as they practice and build their school-readiness skills. Dora’s Great Big World is the perfect tool to help your child prepare for school! Children will also earn stars as they visit each location and play games. Use stars to unlock animated stickers in Backpack! As you unlock more and more stickers, your child will become a Junior, Great and Super Explorer! Come on, Explorers! ¡Vámonos! Let’s go! Dora’s Great Big World includes: •Curriculum developed and reviewed by preschool education expert •5 kid-tested games focused on fundamental preschool skills •5 beloved locations to visit from Dora’s world, as seen in episodes •60 animated stickers to decorate the five locations •3 special Explorer Badges as your child progresses: Junior, Great and Super Explorer! •Customizable photo badges for emailing and sharing! •Unique daily challenges from Dora •Special high fives with Dora •Unexpected appearances from that sneaky fox, Swiper, who is trying to swipe your stars! •Special star piñatas that the child can open for a prize •Player profiles that allow more than one child to play while saving game progress Dora’s Great Big World HD collects personal user data as well as non- personal user data (including aggregated data). User data collection is in accordance with applicable law, such as COPPA. User data may be used, for example, to respond to user requests; enable users to take advantage of certain features and services; personalize content and advertising; and manage and improve Nickelodeon's services. For more information regarding Nickelodeon’s use of personal user data, please visit the Nickelodeon Group Privacy Policy below. Our Privacy Policy is in addition to any terms, conditions or policies agreed to between you and Google, Inc., and Nickelodeon and its affiliated entities are not responsible for Google's collection or use of your personal user data and information. Use of this app is subject to the Nickelodeon End User License Agreement. Privacy Policy http://www.nickjr.com/about/privacy-policy.html End User License Agreement http://www.nick.com/info/eula.html Additional Notes: Dora’s Great Big World HD offers in-app purchases and charges real money for additional in-app content. You may lock out the ability to purchase in-app content by adjusting your device’s settings.

description: Chương trình luyện nghe tiếng Anh VOA là chương trình giúp các bạn luyện tập kỹ năng nghe tiếng anh hiệu quả, với giọng đọc Mỹ rất hay. VOA là viết tắt của từ Voice Of American. Chương trình gồm 80 bài, gồm có cả âm thanh, video. Các bài học đã được dịch sang tiếng việt cẩn thận. Các chức năng chính như sau: - Tìm kiếm bài học theo tên, theo danh mục. - Lưu lịch sử, lưu các bài ưu thích, lưu các bài đã được tải tập tin âm thanh, lưu các bài đã tải video. - Nghe âm thanh của bài, bạn có thể nghe từng đoạn bằng công cụ trên trình nghe - Hẹn giờ để tắt bài nghe. - Tải âm thanh về để nghe offline - Tải video về và nghe ofline. Chức năng này cần có bộ nhớ ngoài hoặc thẻ nhớ. - Thảo luận cho cả ứng dụng và thảo luận cho từng bài - Hiển thị dịch từng câu với nội dung góc, hoặc dịch theo từng câu khi chọn một câu - Bạn có thể dịch bằng máy (máy dịch) khi không có phần dịch của chuyên gia dịch thuật - Dịch từ bằng việc tích hợp từ điển - Lưu từ mới và ôn tập lại trong quá trình dịch - Hiển thị các thành ngữ ở màn hình chính, giúp chúng ta học thành ngữ dễ dàng hơn. - Khi máy của chúng ta gần hết dung lượng bộ nhớ trong, chương trình sẽ hiển thị thông báo cho chúng ta sử dụng online nhằm giải phóng bộ nhớ của chương trình. Chương trình có hiển thị quảng cáo để kiếm doanh thu phát triển, các bạn có thể bỏ quảng cáo bằng cách mua ứng dụng. Sử dụng thẻ cào điện thoại để mua ứng dụng. (Thẻ Viettel, VinaPhone, MobiPhone). Những người làm ứng dụng muốn có một lời với tất cả các bạn học tiếng anh. "Có công mài sắt có ngày nên kim". Từ khóa: tieng anh, hoc tieng anh, học tiếng anh hang ngay, tieng anh hang ngay, hoc tieng anh cho nguoi viet, học tiếng anh, tiếng anh giao tiếp, tieng anh giao tiep, hoc tieng anh cho nguoi viet, học tiếng anh cho người việt, từ điển tiếng anh, tu dien anh viet, tu dien viet anh The program is listening VOA English programs help you practice your listening skills effectively, with great American voice. VOA stands for the Voice of America. The program consists of 80 items, including both audio, video. The lesson has been carefully translated into Vietnamese. The main functions are as follows: - Search lessons by name, by category. - Save history, save favorite articles, save articles were downloaded audio files, save all downloaded videos. - Listen to audio of all, you can listen to each segment using the tool on the player - Timer to turn off all heard. - Download the audio for offline listening - Download and listen Ofline video. This function requires external memory or memory card. - Talk to the applications for each post and discuss - Show the contents translated by the corner, or service by picking a sentence sentences - You can translate by machines (machine translation) without the services of professional translation - Translated from the dictionary by integrating - Save and review new words in the translation process - Show the idioms in the main screen, to help us learn the language easier. - As we near the end of the machine memory capacity of the program will display a message for us to use the online release of the program memory. The program can display ads to earn revenue growth, you can remove the ads by purchasing the application. Using your phone scratch cards to buy apps. (Card Viettel, VinaPhone, Mobiphone). Those who want to have a word application with all your learning. "It makes perfect grinding of metal." NOW AVAILABLE FOR ANDROID - WITH MANY NEW FEATURES ! Liquix is known as the most popular eLiquid mixing app for e-cigarette lovers and is an intuitive, easy-to-use but very versatile eLiquid calculator that not only calculates the required amounts when mixing your liquids, but also helps you to manage your bases, flavors and recipes. Liquix tells you the needed amounts of your ingredients by volume ( milliliters), drops and weight (grams). The latter is very useful if you prefer to mix by weight, which is much simpler and cleaner (you only need a scale and a few plastic bottles). Liquix also shows the calculated price of your liquid -in total, per millilitre and even per ingredient, so you know exactly what part of your liquid is the most expensive one. For each of your basic ingredients and flavors you can specify a personal comment, a custom icon, the PG / VG / water amount, as well as the volume and the price. When mixing a liquid or creating a recipe, simply chose your needed ingredients and flavors and let Liquix calculate it all for you. Want to get inspired by other users? Then browse the giant Liquix database with more than 4000(!) recipes, which is steadily growing. Or upload your own recipes to share them with other e-cigarette lovers throughout the world! Liquix is a lovingly crafted, versatile tool, built by e-cigarette lovers and by practical experience. The app is optimized for quick and easy handling and thus the ideal tool when mixing your liquids. COMPLETE REVISION - MANY NEW FEATURES ! · Simple, easy and intuitive handling · Lovely design and stylish looks · Save any number of basic ingredients and bases · Save any number of flavors · Save any number of liquid - recipes · Alphabetically sort your ingredients · Compose new recipes, easily and quickly · Add any number of flavors per recipe · Mix by weight (g), drops (drp) and volume (ml) · Displays the total cost of Liquids · Displays the cost of each ingredient · Displays the cost per ml of your liquid · Online database with more than 4000 recipes! · Search filter to quickly find recipes with certain ingredients · Upload your own recipes and share them with others ! · Adjustable currency · Customizable colors & design · Graphical representation of your liquid's ingredients · Clear and intuitive user interface · Backup your data and ingredients · Helpful hints regarding the topic of eSmoking
